Title: HaNoi City Tour and Food Tour - Private Tour Guide By Tony
Description: Nếu có đi tour Hà Nội hoặc các vùng lân cận, tôi khuyên bạn nên chọn Tony Tourist, tôi đã sử dụng nhiều công ty tour khác nhưng thường giá cao kèm dịch vụ không như chương trình đưa ra. Nhưng tháng 10 vừa rồi tôi có đặt tour Ha Long bên Anh Tony Tourist và rất hài lòng về sự tư vấn nhiệt tình , giá rẻ với dịch vụ tốt như anh đảm bảo. Tôi sẽ giới thiệu thêm bạn bè nếu có du lịch Hà Nội. Chúc anh ngày càng nhiều khách biết đến Tony Tourist .
Rank_of_province: Số 107 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Hoi An Ancient Town
Description: yên tĩnh , cảm giác thoải mái đi đến nơi đây du lịch, ngươi dân địa phương rất thân thiện, món ăn ngon dân dã, nhất là món bánh bèo cô Thu, giá rẻ nhưng rất ngon
Rank_of_province: Số 2 trên 4 Chuyến tham quan & hoạt động ở Cam An

Title: Hue Student Tour
Description:
Had a great time with Huong and Sy at the evening food tour in Hue! They were very friendly and took us to places we wouldn't have found otherwise. Throughout the tour we enjoyed several kinds of traditional and popular foods in Hue.
Also, Chao, the tour organizer made a huge effort in taking my dietary restrictions (gluten free) into consideration. This is highly appreciated!
Rank_of_province: Số 8 trên 39 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Huế

Title: Detoured Asia
Rank_of_province: Số 28 trên 154 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Vespa Wanderers
Description:
Going on the Vespa tour was amazing. We got to experience Ho Chi Minh City by night in a way we would never had on our own or in a car. The buzzing street life with flower markets, restaurants, families eating outside was one of a kind.
Despite intense traffic, we felt very safe at the back of the vespa with the experienced drivers, who were very attentive to ensure we were alright and had a good time.
The Vespa Wanderers team did their utmost to make this a special event for us with excellent guiding and food. We truly recommend going on a vespa tour with this team of great people!
Rank_of_province: Số 8 trên 296 Giải trí về đêm ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Joyous Travel
Description: Nam is a very well organised tour guide and a great storyteller. Being an aspiring photographer he took a series of photos during the day and shared them with us after we returned to Saigon. We really enjoyed our trip to Mekong Delta. Thank you.
Rank_of_province: Số 11 trên 273 Phương tiện giao thông ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Good Morning Vietnam Travel
Description:
1. A well-planned itinerary handled by a competent English speaking guide.

2. The local guide was helpful in getting good photo shots. Good recommendations on the local dishes to try out.

3. A rather enjoyable trip. With a thoughtful, knowledgeable and fun tour guide.
Rank_of_province: Số 119 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Culture Pham Travel
Description: Ms. Xi was amazing. Best tour guide I’ve had in Vietnam. She did a walking tour of the Hue Imperial City, and tailored everything to what we were interested in. We didn’t have much time in Central Vietnam so she made sure to include a lot of the history that we otherwise would have gotten at other sites. The tour was also advertised as 2.5 hrs but she was with us for 3.5, and willing to stay longer at no extra charge. She also answered all of our many historical questions beautifully and gave us some great local food recs! Highly recommend :)
Rank_of_province: Số 22 trên 84 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Huế

Title: The Vietnam Tourism - Day Tours
Description: My wife and I used this company last year when we were interested in a golf vacation and Halong Bay cruise. It was under the name of Vietnam Golf Tours. We had a great experience with them at that time and had no hesitation in using them again. This time I wanted to take my business colleagues on a trip to Hoi An. This company arranged the hotels, domestic flights from Ho Chi Minh City and some tours for us while we were there. Using WhatsApp we had instant communication with them and they respond very quickly to any requests. It makes your trip a trouble free one. We love the ladies at this company and their strong customer focus.
Rank_of_province: Số 93 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Asia Great Tours
Description:
Thank you to both Anna and Billy for a wonderful 10 days in Vietnam. Miss Anna worked hard with me to arrange our private tour trip exactly as I wanted. She was sweet, helpful, caring, and diligent, and a pleasure to work with. When she left the company we were smoothly transferred to Mr. Billy who did a wonderful job with last minute changes as a result of the start of the Corona virus. Our trip was everything I dreamed of and Mr. Billy made sure that every day was worry free, checking in with us in the evening with updates.
The price was reasonable, a bit more than I would have paid on my own, but worth it as I didn't have to worry about anything after arriving in Vietnam. We were picked up at the airport by a driver with our names and at every spot there was someone waiting to meet us. All the cars were very comfortable and drivers were courteous and friendly. I recommend using Vietnam Great Tours for your first time in Vietnam as they work hard to make your trip fun and worry free.
Rank_of_province: Số 97 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Phố Cổ Hà Nội
Description: Cuối tuần đi bộ ở phố cổ cùng gia đình thật tốt, con trai tôi rất thích đi chơi ở đây. Tôi khuyên các bạn có gia đình đưa con đến chơi!
Rank_of_province: Số 109 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Cycloresto Cooking Class
Description:
We had the most amazing experience cooking authentic Vietnamese food. Starting the day in the market buying ingredients, we then prepared 4 course under Chef Vu’s direction.
The food we produced was fantastic (if I do say so myself)
Thank you Cycloresto
Rank_of_province: Số 11 trên 147 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: XO Tours
Description: We did the walking tour to Cam Kim island. It was fantastic. One of the best things we did in Vietnam. Our guides were wonderful and we went to 2 houses on the island, got amazing food and great conversation. It was so nice to get out in to the countryside and walking amongst the rice paddies and farms. The boat ride was great and we watched a fisherman unloading his fishing net. We then finished the evening with a refreshing desert in town.
Rank_of_province: Số 39 trên 206 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hội An

Title: The Vietnamese Cooking Class
Description: We thoroughly enjoyed our cooking class. We each prepared 3 different dishes (see photos), which were easy enough to do and tasted great. The format was that we prepare a dish, then ate it, then prepared the next, ate it, etc. This was perfect. Our instructor demonstrated what we needed to do and then guided us as we did it ourselves. The location is in a restaurant across the street from the Park Hyatt Saigon where we were staying
Rank_of_province: Số 12 trên 147 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Asia Hero Travel
Description: Agence au top. Du sur-mesure et hyper-réactif quand il s'agit de devoir modifier des plans quand par exemple un typhon pointe le bout de son nez. C'est un privilège d'échanger avec Hung qui adore son métier et aime faire découvrir son pays sous tous ses aspects : pagodes et temples, histoire, cuisine etc...
Rank_of_province: Số 108 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Xe Om Tours - Day Tours
Description: 소중한 추억 감사하며 하노이 방문하신분들에게 강추드립니다 오토바이 투어를 통해서 차로 할 수 없는 곳까지 구석구석 볼 수 있어서 정말 좋았습니다 설명을 너무너무 잘해 주셔서 감사드리며 다음에 또 오더라도 꼭 신청해서 가도록 하겠습니다
Rank_of_province: Số 99 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Trails Of Indochina
Description: We loved the Cu Chi Tunnels with the best ever knowledgeable, English speaking guide Anna. She was so informative and also took us to the pslace and post office
Rank_of_province: Số 21 trên 273 Phương tiện giao thông ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Slow Travel Hue
Description: We had an excellent time cycling around some private houses with considerable history & beautiful gardens / architecture. The company was thoughtful and provided a cyclo (rickshaw) for my son while my wife and I cycled - a great way to get to know the local area and way of life. Good food and some unusual experiences (e. g. foot bath) were included.
Rank_of_province: Số 23 trên 84 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Huế

Title: Beetrip
Description: My first impression of Tan Son Nhat Airport in Vietnam was that it was very busy and crowded. The airport was bustling with people coming and going, and it was quite overwhelming at first. However, the staff were friendly and helpful, making the experience much more enjoyable. The facilities were modern and clean, with plenty of shops and restaurants to explore. It may have been a bit chaotic.
Rank_of_province: Số 9 trên 273 Phương tiện giao thông ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Sinh Cafe Travel
Description: Dịch vụ tốt, giá cả phải chăng, nhân viên tư vấn nhiệt tình, tôi rất hài lòng và sẽ quay trở lại khi có dịp.
Rank_of_province: Số 134 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Smile Travel
Description: Tháng 11 công ty chúng tôi đã có chuyến du lịch thái lan 5 ngày 4 đêm đầy ý nghĩa, Chương trình thành công ngoài mong đợi, HDV nhiệt tình, Khách sạn ok, Lái xe chuẩn chỉnh đúng giờ. Đoàn vừa du lịch kết hợp nghỉ dưỡng, đồ ăn ở Thái Lan cũng ngon và hợp khẩu vị. Chúc Smile Travel luôn là đơn vị tổ chức tour uy tín được nhiều khách hàng tin tưởng và sử dụng dịch vụ
Rank_of_province: Số 140 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Hanoi Happy Tours
Description: What an incredible and informative tour! Afterwards, Kien and Linh went above and beyond in helping me arrange transport and schedule the next part of my trip, in addition to giving me great advice and recommendations. They genuinely want their clients to have the best experience, personalized to individual preferences. I'm so grateful for their kindness and service. These are two of the friendliest people you'll meet in Vietnam!
Rank_of_province: Số 49 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Moon Travel Tours
Description: Moon took me on her Vespa to several local farmers that did old world Hand carving, weaving, noodle making and fishing. I got to meet so many locals on the other side of the river. Much less touristy. Moon did an amazing job explaining the culture, customs and way of life. I would definitely recommend her tours. She gives a very passionate tour
Rank_of_province: Số 60 trên 206 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hội An

Title: Saigon Free Day Tours
Description:
The free walking tour of the city center was not the best.
Because hotel pick-up was not allowed (although staying in district 1), we asked if we could start the tour 30 min later. It was no problem but actually it was, as we had to rush from one spot to the other to be on time for the reunification palace (as it closes at a specific moment).
The explanations were quite brief and english was not superb. It was a bit dissappointing
Rank_of_province: Số 71 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Taste Of Hue
Description: We did the tour with 4 people, of which 2 are vegetarian. That was no problem, but do say it in advance. The tour was fun and Lang, our guide, was great and told us a lot of things about the food, Hue, Vietnam, etc. However, for vegetarians i think it is not really worth doing it. Also some places felt a little 'touristy'.
Rank_of_province: Số 5 trên 35 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Huế

Title: Saigon Tours - Ho Chi Minh Food Tours
Rank_of_province: Số 14 trên 273 Phương tiện giao thông ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Best Tour In Vung Tau
Description: Private Tour booked in advance via email. Picked up from Cruise Ship as arranged and taken off for the day to visit local village to see Coracle being built and then to the coast to see local fishermen casting nets from their Coracle. Chose some freshly caught sea food which was immediately put into a Cold box and taken back to Your Guide's Organic Farm. Spent following hours visiting many places of interest and learning about the Vietnamese/American War from the perspective of a Vietnamese. Visited family made dugouts and tunnels. Went to Organic Farm wandered around looking at various exitic crops before having the most delicious lunch which included our freshly caught sea food. Would highly recommend this trip as unique
Rank_of_province: I and value for money.
Link_FoodTour: Số 1 trên 20 Chuyến tham quan & hoạt động ở Vũng Tàu

Title: Lumina Travel - Vietnam Holiday Booking
Description:
Mint help us with the trip to ha long bay and she was really helpful giving us the perfect information for our trip, it was amazing everything. I'm really happy that she helped us and also the cruise and the bungalow was amazing they are really kind and helpful.
If you are in Hanoi and want to experience the best with the best memories this is the place.
Rank_of_province: Số 32 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Nha Trang Street Food Tour
Description: Quán ăn này khá ngon đối với các du lịch muốn thưởng thức ẩm thực đường phố tại thành phố Nha trang, giá cũng tốt
Rank_of_province: Số 3 trên 26 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Nha Trang

Title: Hue Travel Cars
Description:
Hien was an absolute delight! He truly made my trip around Central Vietnam so memorable. He was very knowledgeable and provided great information about each site I was visiting before I arrived. His English was very good, which made conversing a breeze.

He was also very courteous, always opening my door for me and walking me to where the ticket line was and speaking with the seller to ensure I paid for what I wanted.

If you want a great, safe and knowledgeable driver, definitely make sure you book Hien when you come to Hue!
Rank_of_province: Số 6 trên 35 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Huế

Title: Saigon Tuktuk Tours
Description:
Our group of 3 absolutely loved this tour. Definitely took us to places we would never have found and we tried food that we had never seen before. When they tell you to go hungry they mean it!!
Rose and Pumba were our guides. They shared a lot of local knowledge with us and were extremely fun.
This really is a fantastic tour!
Rank_of_province: Số 89 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Hanoi Beer Tour
Description:
Have taken dozens of tours of all types across 70 plus countries…this was the best ever.
It’s not just a beer tour it’s a food and history tour. It was exhilarating to be with Min and his team. My driver Kenny was also great!!
To be honest I was very afraid as I only have been on a motorcycle one time in my life. Min coached me to just relax. I eventually did and was thrilled to see the various sites around Hanoi.
If you want an overview of the city take this tour.
JUST OUTSTANDING

Also, price is very reasonable so tip them well ..
Rank_of_province: Số 127 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: V'explore Travel
Description: We have now traveled twice with an V’Explore, to Vietnam prior to COVID and to Cambodia and Thailand these past two weeks. My fiancé and I have traveled the world over and can truly say that V’Explore is hands down the best travel company we have ever used. The will customize your travel plans utilizing the most friendly and professional tour guides and drivers. All accommodations, meals, tours and the like at first class at prices that can’t be beat. Best of all they have never missed a single step at any point along the way over two multi-city and multi-country trips. They are responsive and deliver an extraordinary vacation and travel experience. Just make an inquiry about your next trip. I promise you will book and have a great time.
Rank_of_province: Số 80 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Tours By Locals
Description: We would like to extend our gratitude to David and ToursByLocals, for their excellent service. Due to a unforeseen family crisis of our original guide, our full day trip in Ninh Binh, was in danger of being cancelled. Swift customer service resolved the situation quickly and led to an amazing result. We had nothing short of an exceptional experience with David as our guide. He is very knowledgeable about the history and really goes the extra mile when it comes to providing experiences and comfort.
Rank_of_province: Số 112 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Private Hanoi Food Tour
Description:
A recommended booking a tour at the beginning of your stay in Hoi An to get a great overview of the locations and food! :
Lena was very knowledgeable and personable. She had a genuine interest in her subject — She wasn’t just going through the motions. This was an introduction to foods we never would have tried on our own - black sesame soup in a private backyard is a prime example . We discovered area of Hoi An that were truly off the beaten track ! Highly recommend.
Rank_of_province: Số 103 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: hue food advisor
Rank_of_province: Số 21 trên 84 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Huế

Title: Vietnam Private Travel
Description: Minh va gia dinh chọn Tony lam huong dan vien du lich cho tour gia dinh vào dịp Tet nam nay, minh that su hai long voi dich vu cua anh.
Rank_of_province: Số 37 trên 154 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Little Orchid Travel
Description:
良いリムジン、熱心なガイド、清潔な船の旅で過ごしました。
それから、船での食べ放題メニューが美味しくて、いろいろな食べ物を提供しました。ハロン湾はとても綺麗な所で、素敵な景色が見られた。残念ながら今回の旅は１日しかないので、行きたいけれども行けないところが多いです。ぜひもう一度行くと思います。
Rank_of_province: Số 48 trên 525 Mua sắm ở Hà Nội

Title: Easy Riders Buon Ma Thuot
Description: Điều đầu tiên tôi nhận thấy rằng vùng đất này đẹp hơn tôi nghĩ,cái nắng gió của vùng cao nguyên không thể ngăn cản sự tò mò của tôi về vùng đất này,ngày đầu tiên tôi được một anh chàng hdv vô cùng dễ mến của easy riders đến đón tại khách sạn,khác với những chuyến đi khác tôi thường di chuyển bằng ô tô nhưng lần này để khám phá hết và cũng để đổi thay cảm giác,tôi đã đi xe máy cùng anh hdv bản địa,chặng đường đầu tiên thật háo hức,chúng tôi di chuyển 40km từ thành phố buôn ma thuật đến buôn đôn,và khi được ngắm nhìn các chú voi thì thật là vui thích,được tìm hiểu về đời sống văn hóa dân tộc Ê đê,được tận mắt xem ngôi nhà Rông và hiểu về chức năng của nó.thật tuyệt vời với những trải nghiệm...chiều tôi ngồi nhâm nhi ly cà phê ban mê.và ngẫm lại những thứ tôi đã trải qua ngày hôm nay...ngày hôm sau tôi được anh chàng hdv đưa đến con thác Draynur,Draysap,chúng thật hùng vĩ nghe thấy tiếng nc chảy là thích rồi...có lẽ viết đến đây cũng đã dài,nhưng cái cảm nghỉ thì cứ tuôn ra trong tôi,cảm ơn hdv easy riders,cảm ơn vùng đất buôn ma thuật đã đem lại cho tôi sự hiểu biết...xin chào hẹn một ngày nào đó không xa...
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 3 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Buôn Ma Thuột

Title: Vietnam Travel Advisory
Description: My family and I are satisfied customers under Stella’s service. We originally booked Rita Cruise for our Halong Bay cruise but they have canceled on us due to the weather and they were not operating on the days we are able to do so. So, I contacted Stella if she knows of a cruise that is operating on those available days we have left before we head home to Singapore. And yes voila, she found the best room at Athena cruise with excellent service. Couldn’t ask for better. I am definitely going to contact her again when I visit Vietnam once again. Thank you for your excellent response Dear Stella. She is prompt and helpful.
Rank_of_province: Số 56 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Street Food Hanoi
Description: Nuestra guía fue Sara, que aunque con falta de experiencia todavía, estuvo muy agradable y predispuesta y con un gran esfuerzo por explicarnos los sitios, la comida, las costumbres. Además, fomenta la conversación y la relación en el grupo. Nosotros fuimos 6 que eramos al misma familia y un apersona que se apunto. El tour esta bien. Estuvimos unas cuatro horas y visitamos 8 locales con un plato típico de la comida vietnamita en cada uno de ellos. Los locales iban de más decorados y limpios hasta taskas típicas en las que solo dan ese plato. no entraba el Pho, pero no hace falta. se puede comer en muchos sitios. Si que nos llevo y nos enseño el sitio afamado de pho, el pho 10. La experiencia es buena y si estas por Hanoi y quieres pasar una tarde investigando y descubriendo la gastronomía y las calles del old quartet merece la pena.
Rank_of_province: Số 118 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: I Love Vietnam Tour
Description:
This was one of my fantastic experiences in visiting Vietnam and Traveling to Hue City I would 100% recommend this for those that want the best in service. I read reviews on the website before leaving Australia and I decided to go for it – I was in no way disappointed! The whole 4 days ran smoothly, and I felt very safe on the bikes with the lady bikers. The various little stops on the way were beautiful and the team is very knowledgeable and utmost friendly during the tours I learnt important and interesting Vietnam's culture. If you're planning on visiting Hue and want the best and don't mind getting on a motorbike, then I couldn't recommend this service more highly!!
Please note that i was unable to submit the correct year on the web during the covid pandemic, I was very lucky to have been able to take part in such a great experience.

Thank you all and looking forward to experiencing this great adventure again next year.
Ian Melbourne Australia.
Rank_of_province: Số 17 trên 84 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Huế

Title: Happy Holiday Private Tours
Description: Tour giới thiệu nhiều điểm tham quan thú vị, hdv thân thiện và nhiệt tình, dịch vụ khá tốt, m chắc chắn sẽ lựa chọn tour cho chuyến đi tới 👏😘😘😘
Rank_of_province: Số 14 trên 98 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Đà Nẵng

Title: Hoian Farmers Restaurant & Cooking School
Description: Lớp học nấu ăn rất thú vị , nhân viên thân thiện , không gian yên bình . Tôi đã được tiếp xúc trực tiếp và có nhiều cảm nhận về cuộc sống , thiên nhiên nơi đây . Chúng rất vui vẻ qua việc bắt cua và câu cá , cũng như chèo thuyền trên sông...
Rank_of_province: Số 44 trên 167 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hội An

Title: TIMELINE TRAVEL
Description: tối t6 uống 1 chai bia 50k, ngồi trên ban công. Timeline Coffee ngắm phổ cổ . Vị trí thật tuyệt vời, bên dưới quán là phố đi bộ có cả hát live xem freeee

Title: Vietnam Free Tour Guides - Vtrippie
Description: The best tour ever! Seriously, the students are great! I even brought my 10 month baby but everything went smooth ❤️ If you are reading this dont hesitate to book them 🤗 we liked the food and seeing the whole city like a local. Thank you, we will recommend it to everyone we know ❤️ Love you guys 😘
Rank_of_province: Số 69 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Hue Urban Adventures
Description: I booked the Imperial City Tour. The guide, Van, is so knowledgeable and lovely. She could answer all of my questions with patience. The tour shows many interesting historical or religous sites. It felt like the perfect tour to do in Hue.
Rank_of_province: Số 20 trên 84 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Huế

Title: Hoi An Street Food Tours
Description: This was a really nice and personal experience. Sam is super sweet and speaks good English. She enthusiastically shared the ins and outs of coffee and its history. No standard story, which we liked. She really took time for us and also answered our questions that didn’t have to do anything with coffee making. We were preparing the coffees behind the bar of the cafe. Almost felt like we were professionals 😃.
Rank_of_province: Số 61 trên 206 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hội An

Title: Hanoi Local Food Tours
Description: Very nice tour through the old quarter, trying different dishes at different small places, which you as tourist do not easily find yourself. Most of them we loved! During the tour also a lot of know abouts explained by our enthusiastic guide.
Rank_of_province: Số 95 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Saigon Motorbike Tours - private day tours
Description: My friends and I had the privilege of joining the Saigon on Motorbike, City Historical Tour. Sofia, Henry, and Mike were our guides. All of them are very knowledgeable, friendly and informative. They even went out of thier way to help my friend buy some tea, in which we did not know where to purchase. I highly recommend this kind of tour. It was an adventure just to be on the Motorbike in this hectic city. A big thank you the three individuals who made this a memorable tour.
Rank_of_province: Số 65 trên 424 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Saigon Happy Tour
Description:
I had an amazing experience on the Cu Chi Tunnel tour with Saigon Happy Tour! Our guide, Happy, made the trip truly unforgettable. Happy's extensive knowledge about the tunnels and their history was both impressive and informative. He was not only passionate about sharing this history but also showed genuine care and attention towards our group throughout the tour.

Happy's enthusiasm and willingness to answer all our questions added depth to the experience. The Cu Chi Tunnels themselves were fascinating, and Happy's insights brought them to life. He ensured that everyone in the group felt comfortable and engaged, making the tour both educational and enjoyable.

I highly recommend Saigon Happy Tour, especially with Happy as your guide, for an exceptional Cu Chi Tunnel experience that you won't forget. Thank you for making our day so memorable!
Rank_of_province: Số 72 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Secret Food Tours Hanoi
Description: I was the only customer for this tour, so I had a personal guide through the old quarter street food. Gin was the perfect guide and host for this adventure. She was conversant and knowledgeable, spoke excellent English and kept me entertained throughout. I would recommend this tour as an introduction to Vietnamese cuisine and the street food world of Hanoi. I cannot praise Gin enough, she was the best!
Rank_of_province: Số 84 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: HTS Tour & Transport
Description:
Service parfait de HTS à Hanoi. Réactivité des réponses, en particulier de Julie. Chauffeurs parfaitement ponctuels aussi bien à l'aller (pick-up airport pour aller en centre ville) qu'au retour (drop-off à l'aéroport depuis le centre-ville) .
Très bob rapport qualité prix. Je recommande.
Rank_of_province: Số 126 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: 24h Tour
Description:
Trong đợt hè vừa rồi, tôi và gia đình có dự định đi Thái và Sing, nhưng thật sự băn khoăn không biết nên đi tự túc hay đi tour. Rồi mỗi người một ý, bla bla....
Và thì quyết định cuối là đi tour, tôi và em gái tìm hiểu khá nhiều tour tại HN. Và dừng chân cuối cùng vs 24h Tour do 1 người bạn giới thiệu .
Đầu tiên cảm ơn bên cty đã lên plan Thái 4ng3đ cho tôi khá ok. Lịch trình tôi có chỉnh lại và đc sửa lại chuẩn theo ý hơn. Và chúng tôi có yêu cầu cao về vé và dịch vụ hotel . Phải nói như thế nào nhỉ, cho đến ngày đi và rồi ngày về chúng tôi rất ưng í ở hotel bên Thái và mọi sự hướng dẫn của bên tour.
Lịch trình vạch lên rất trơn tru từ khâu đón tiến tới dịch vụ ăn uống. Khách sạn của chúng tôi nằm ở vị trí gần các trung tâm mua sắm và điều thú vị nhất là khách sạn có bể bơi. Phòng ốc rất sạch và nhân viên rất lịch sự. Hướng dẫn viên cung cấp thông tin rất chu đáo và kỹ lưỡng. Chúng tôi không vấp phải bất cứ vấn đề trong toàn gói tour này.
Với chất lượng dịch vụ ngoài sức mong đợi và hoàn hảo chúc tôi đã giới thiệu cho bạn bè và gia đình về dịch vụ 24h Tour đặc biệt là những gói tour nước ngoài.
Rank_of_province: Số 130 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Vietnam Tour Fun
Description: All the excursions we went on were excellent, especially when we visited the river island. I really enjoyed working with clay and trying to make something local. Our tour guide in Bangkok was fantastic, very polite, and really introduced to us Thailand in the best way. The Samet island was lovely too, it wasn't too crowded, and we could enjoy some privacy. It definitely was an unforgettable experience for us. Vietnam Tour Fun did an amazing job in organizing the trip from the excursions, to our meals, and always provided fresh water for us. Thank you!
Rank_of_province: Số 115 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Vietnam Travelers Tour
Description: Did the bike ride with Nathan, he took me thru the Old Town and assisted with everything I needed. Highly recommended 👍
Rank_of_province: Số 110 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Vietnam Kayaking Ventures
Description: Tour thiết kế rất phù hợp nhu cầu của nhóm bạn mình, lịch trình hợp lý, thoải mái và không ồn ào, xô bồ. Bạn hướng dẫn viên chuyên nghiệp và anh lái tàu rất chu đáo, nhiệt tình, nấu ăn rất ngon. Nói chung là rất thích hợp cho nhóm bạn và gia đình muốn có tour tham quan thích hợp
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 7 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Cát Bà

Title: Vietnam Travel & Cruise
Description: Hiking Sapa with a local (Amazing Ly), cycling the back streets of Ninh Binh, rowing into the caves, walking the streets of Hanoi with a guide to direct us to the best food (Hai 👏👏), cruising Ha Long Bay on Mon Cherie (salute Ann & Tam and their team👏👏👏) was all customized to fit our short visit. With two young adults and moderately fit olds - this adventure was coordinated through Travel Managers Australia’s Angela Spicer with this fabulously expert Vietnam company. Timing was impeccable. Response was immediate. We never felt alone as you might in a city where few speak your language. Outstanding hotels, great locations - all-in-all - they hit the mail on the head👏👏👏
Rank_of_province: Số 152 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Hanoi City Day Tours
Description: We booked the half day city tour a day in advance on freetour.com . We stood at the meeting place well in advance and were looking around for signs of the tour guide everywhere. After 20 minutes past the meeting time we walked away and finding wifi to contract them . After some time they got back to us apologising for „canceling“ the tour. Obviously the stuffed the booking up either never saw we booked or forgot to tell us it was cancelled . On a positive note they tried to organise us a new tour but it just wouldn’t fit in our travel plans. Sorry for leaving this review as all the other ones are really good and I’m jealous we couldn’t experience that.
Rank_of_province: Số 94 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Vietnam Travel With Us
Rank_of_province: Số 80 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: HANOI PREMIUM TRAVEL
Description:
We had a wonderful 10 days in Northern Vietnam, with top service from start to finish.
All the arrangements were outstanding, with good hotels, great food, and the tours/ itineraries were fabulous.
Our guide Tuan was fabulous. Smart guy, full of information, and very friendly. He showed us around, made us comfortable, and gave us an education about Vietnam.
Thanks Hanoi Premium Travel for an incredible trip. We would recommend Hanoi Premium Travel and Northern Vietnam as a great place to visit.
Rank_of_province: Số 124 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Hanoi Airport Cab
Description:
I had booked an airport transfer from HCM airport to my hotel. Unfortunately our inward flight was cancelled 4 hours after the scheduled departure from Australia to be rescheduled for the following day.

Within minutes of cancellation of the flight the SnartRide service contacted us by WhatsApp to reschedule to our new flight. This happened to coincide with a holiday weekend but a new transfer was organised without fuss.

The car was at the airport arrivals as rearranged fir a smooth ride to our hotel.

The service levels experienced were fantastic.
Rank_of_province: Số 64 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Dynasty Cruises Halong
Description:
Phòng ốc khá rộng rãi,có ban công riêng ngắm biển rất đẹp. Phòng tắm có bồn sục massage view biển tuyệt vời . Nhân viên rất thân thiện và hiếu khách. Các món ăn bữa trưa đầu tiên và bữa tối rất ngon. Tàu có các hoạt động Karaoke, chèo thuyền kayak, tham quan hang động miễn phí. Hướng dẫn viên và lễ tân rất tận tình, chu đáo khi dẫn khách tham quan.

Tàu phù hợp với những khách ưa hoạt động, đặc biệt là với ai thích hát karaoke giữa vịnh. Tôi đặt ở tầng 1, khá yên tĩnh, không bị âm thanh Karaoke ảnh hưởng. Internet ở tầng 1 dùng tạm được.

Điểm trừ : phòng không có TV và hướng dẫn viên đưa khách ra đảo titop vào thời điểm thủy triều lên, bãi bé và nước thì đục, xấu, nếu để sang ngày hôm sau thì bãi titop rất rộng.
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 20 Giải trí về đêm ở Vịnh Hạ Long

Title: Sapa Vacation Travel
Description: Great guy, very enjoyable trip. Was interesting to learn about the culture and have a look into the local people's lives. The views were also breathtaking and ranging throughout the days.
Rank_of_province: Số 2 trên 11 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Sapa

Title: Pocket Friendly Food Tour of Hoi An in Vietnam
Description: Rosie and her team were very hospitable and accommodating towards our multi-generational family. We had a wonderful experience walking around Hoi An and getting a taste of their local delights. Rosie also made the effort to share stories of the food origins so that we could appreciate what we were eating. Thank you for the amazing time! ❤️
Rank_of_province: Số 46 trên 206 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hội An

Title: Hanoi Free Day Tours
Description:
My Guide Zenni was lovely and on time. I really enjoyed my tour/chat with her :)

The tour i booked was Ho Chi Minh Complex & Temple of Literature Group Tour but it was just Zenni and me (maybe because of Tet).

Please take note that Ho Chi Minh’s Mausoleum will be closed on Monday & Friday!
We are to pay for entrances fees for the guide so prepare approximately 140k Dong (for yourself and your guide!)
Rank_of_province: Số 24 trên 224 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hà Nội

Title: Mr Binh Tours Hanoi
Description: An absolute amazing Ninh Binh day trip with Mr. Binh. I have done many tours living in South East Asia and Mr. Binh was the best so far. Door to door service, he is energetic, considerate, well spoken and very thoughtful in crafting the day’s activities with you. You can feel his passion when he explains the historical significance of the places you visit. He will adjust the itinerary any way you want it and dial up according to your intensity level. I have paid many multiples of money for this kind of service elsewhere and please don’t ruin your short trip with a big group tour offered by the many hostels/shops on the street. You’ll be packed in large buses and shuttled around to commercialized, touristy spots if you do. Get really rural and local with Mr. Binh!
Rank_of_province: Số 75 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Viet Leading Travel
Description:
An experienced and professional travel manager helped me book everything I needed and travel comfortably.
If you choose Viet Leading Travel, I think it's a very good choice
Thank you to Mr. Vinny for helping me with my wonderful trip to Vietnam.
Rank_of_province: Số 128 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Food Tours Hanoi - Day Tour
Description: We throughly enjoyed this food tour. Ngat was an excellent host , she came to greet us at our hotel in the old quarter and took us to great places to eat of the beaten track. We tasted things would would not have imagined in asking if we went into a place to eat. She explained everything really well and has very good english. Thanks for an enjoyable evening!
Rank_of_province: Số 22 trên 224 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hà Nội

Title: The Balcony Beer & Timeline Coffee 7 Dinh Liet
Description: Bánh ngon, đồ uống ngon, không gian quán đẹp, rất thích hợp để chụp ảnh check in post facebook nha các bạn, thấy nhiều bạn mẫu đến đây chụp quảng cáo nên mình cũng đến xem, rất là ưng ý luôn nè, sẽ còn đến nhiều lần
Rank_of_province: Số 17 trên 207 Giải trí về đêm ở Hà Nội

Title: Halong Bay Cruises Tour - S.E.A Wander
Description:
Một ngày nhiều trải nghiệm tuyệt vời cùng chị Luyến - Ms. Ly - đoàn con chim xanh trên vịnh Hạ Long. Quãng thời gian di chuyển mưa ko dứt, tới nơi vẫn mưa ào ào, thế mà lên thuyền ra vịnh lại nắng đẹp. Chị HDV lại cực nhiệt tình, dù đoàn ghép nhưng nhờ chị mà mọi người thân thiết với nhau hơn rất nhiều.
Nếu có ra Hạ Long hãy làm 1 tour như thế này nhé mn!!
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 6 Vui chơi & Giải trí ở Vịnh Hạ Long

Title: Vespa A Go Go
Rank_of_province: Số 88 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Hanoi Foodie and Cycler
Description: I just arrived from the tour with Anna and Andy, they are the best guides in the world. They know about history, they are funny and also very kind person. I recomend to everyone who wants to spend some quality time in Hanoi.
Rank_of_province: Số 60 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: VietnamTours4Fun
Description: Khue and Kai took us on our tour and it was the highlight of our whole trip. A dream come true for my chef husband, our minds were blown by each stop, completely different from the last and ending in the gorgeous food and flower market. Awesome.
Rank_of_province: Số 13 trên 147 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Saigon After Dark
Description: A great evening in Saigon - we were made to feel very welcome and had a most wonderful time. To start off with the traffic was a bit scary but after a few beers, it was fine! The food and drink were excellent and the visit to the secret cafe was extremely interesting. If you do on thing in Saigon do this!
Rank_of_province: Số 76 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Tugo Travel
Description:
*Pros
- Knowledgeable tour leader (yes, we did have 1 tour leader and 1 local tour guide as they’ve committed)
- Critical routes and time management
- Adequate facilities (hotels, transportation, Onsen bath)

*Cons: unreliable pre-departure support!
My family didn’t get the leader’s contact until 14 hours before the departure time. Hilariously, Tugo Travel assumed that their man already got us so they didn’t need to confirm.
Rank_of_province: Số 85 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Hoi An Street Food Tour
Description:
We thoroughly enjoyed this tour, along with our two small children (4 and 2yrs).
The rice farm was very interesting and then cycling around the local area was also a highlight. Upon returning to the local house we continued to learn about the rice growing process, had an awesome opportunity to learn how to cook local dishes and then enjoyed a delicious lunch.
The family were happy to help entertain our children so everyone had a very me memorable time.
Rank_of_province: Số 70 trên 206 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hội An

Title: iO Specialty Coffee
Description: Lần đầu tiên trong đời mình cảm thấy cà phê lại "hấp dẫn" đến vậy, đều nhờ buổi workshop này hết. Được tìm hiểu về chính nguồn gốc của tách cà phê mà mình uống là một trải nghiệm tuyệt hơn bao giờ luôn. Không gian tuyệt vời, các bạn ở quán thì quá là nhiệt tình. Phải nói là một trong những workshop đáng thử nhất nếu bạn có thời gian rảnh. Với mình, mình thì sẽ quay lại đây lần nữa mới được.
Rank_of_province: Số 16 trên 147 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Vietnam Window Travel
Description:
我們在越南從河內到Sapa度過了美好安全的旅程，品嚐了當地美味的料理，這都要感謝Simon細心的安排和服務。
他帶著我們在老城區富有當地特色的老餐廳品嚐了「蛋咖啡」「蛋啤酒」及其他當地人吃的美味路邊點心，了解當地的傳統，特色。除此之外，每當我們到一個新的飯店或景點，他都會發來訊息關切我們是不是得到了好的照顧，是不是他安排的行程都有確實做到，這讓我們感覺安心放鬆。
如果有想到越南旅行，我誠摯地推薦與Simon聯繫，讓他為您的行程助力。

We have great trip, delicious local foods and delicate service from Hanoi to Sapa thanks to Simon. He guides us to taste amazing “Egg coffee and Egg Beer “at an old local shop and also arrange safe trip, delicious local restaurant and great hotel at Sapa. Whatever the problem we met, he figure out as we call him.He take attention to every details such as we were really arrive on time, the room is ok etc.,I can said that he is a very nice and responsible person, really lucky to meet him.
I do recommend that you can contact with him if you want to go Vietnam and stay at his hotel at French Quarter.
Rank_of_province: Số 66 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Backstreet Academy
Description:
We did the 3 hour lantern making class and loved it! The family that runs the place are so nice and relaxed, with great sense of humour! They kept us laughing throughout! They let you do everything yourself but also keep checking to make sure you have a good quality lantern at the end.

Top quality fabrics, a great way to pass an afternoon!
Rank_of_province: Số 46 trên 167 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hội An

Title: Emma OnTheGo
Description:
Emma est la guide parfaite pour vous faire découvrir le Vietnam.
Toujours avec le sourire, toujours partante, c est la personne qui est 100% à votre service et à votre écoute.
Un anglais parfait.
Encore merci pour toute ses découvertes.
Au plaisir
Rank_of_province: Số 14 trên 296 Giải trí về đêm ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Vietnam Apple Travel
Description:
I would like to compliment Johnny. He impressed us with his passionate and caring style even after 6 years. During the trip, I noticed that he is always placing customers’ interests first. He is unique in their his own manners, a good listener. He even remember my birthday and arranged with his restaurant to gave me surprise. This is what struck us to visit him even after 6 years.

With friend like Johnny, it is no wonder Apple Travel is getting busier. People Excellence indeed! I noticed this culture everywhere under his management. He even purposely came over to send us off with a very warm smiling face. Kudos to him :) we will be back again as you guys have created a memorable day for us :) All the best to your business as well :)
Rank_of_province: Số 37 trên 224 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hà Nội

Title: Discover Hoi An Food Tours
Rank_of_province: Số 64 trên 206 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hội An

Title: Ha Long Bay Lux Cruises
Description: Really great service, Mr Tony was contact with us after we booked and provided all information of trip. The cruise was amazing, 5 Star cabins and looks exactly like the photos. The staff were so friendly and helpful. Food was delicious and staff were accommodating to food allergies and dietary requirements. Loved the kayaks and exploring the caves, and really enjoyed the swimming. Transfer from hotel was very good and great communication throughout.
Rank_of_province: Số 58 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Hue Explores
Description: Had such a fabulous day travelling from Hué to Hoi An. I was a solo female traveller and I felt so comfortable the whole day. Could not recommend enough.
Rank_of_province: Số 8 trên 35 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Huế

Title: New Vision Travel
Description: I visited the Cu Chi Tunnels this morning. Josh was an amazing guide! He wants to tell you everything about the Cu Chi Tunnels you'd like to know. Also the transport was really nice!
Rank_of_province: Số 25 trên 273 Phương tiện giao thông ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Maia Food & Travel
Description: My wife and I spent a morning with Thanh on the Walking Street Food Tour in Hanoi and had a great time. The tour included six stops at local street food stalls to taste delicious, authentic North Vietnamese Street Food. There would have been more stops had I allowed for enough time. Thanh is super friendly and knowledgeable about both the food and cooking techniques. She also provided some recommendations for the next stop on our trip (Ho Chi Minh City). Anyone visiting Hanoi who is interested in sampling street food should go on this tour.
Rank_of_province: Số 131 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Eat Hoi An Street Food Tour
Description: This was a fabulous adventure! I chose to do it on my own, and not with my two teenage kids, and thank God I did, this is a reflection on them not the tour! We got to go behind the scenes of the food that is Hoi An and meet people who are genuinely Friends And eat things that were extraordinary and in most cases, delicious. Learnt a lot and had a real experience and cannot recommend it more highly
Rank_of_province: Số 51 trên 167 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hội An

Title: THE SINH CAFE TRAVEL
Rank_of_province: Số 3 trên 14 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Vịnh Hạ Long

Title: MekongEcoTravel
Description:
We had an amazing time with this guide. We had a 2 days, 1 night tour with a lot of activities. She was attentive to our needs and although we are difficult to satisfy, we had no complaints, everything was perfect. We had a real taste of how life is in Mekong delta, and it was authentic and genuine. All the activities were very nice and interesting, we especially loved the boat trip in small canals, seeing heron birds and also the special secret activity in the evening, it was like a dream ! We learned how to cook the local dishes and could practice cooking it and taste it afterwards and many other really delicious dishes. We also learned about the work in the village, we roamed around in motorbike, visit an not touristic floating market, fish farm, fruit garden,noodle and cocoa factory and many more.
Our room at her house was also very cute and cosy. I strongly recommend booking this tour, we wouldn't want someone else to do it.
We want to thank her and her family again for hosting us and we hope to meet her again soon 🤗❤️
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 7 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Cần Thơ

Title: Aqua Of The Seas Cruise
Rank_of_province: Số 4 trên 14 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Vịnh Hạ Long

Title: Lạc Hồng Tours
Description: Ein absolut kompetentes und freundliches reiseburo Reisebüro mit sehr gutem Englisch. Hilfsbereit und nett. Absolut empfehlenswert.
Rank_of_province: Số 104 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Saigon Craft Beer Tours
Description:
This craft beer tour actually covers much more; history, cocktails, markets and craft beer all in one experience.
What a great evening walking and talking with our host An. We were able to sample most local brews and received suggestions on food options in our neighborhood. A great local experience!

Title: Halong Bay Cruise Tour
Description:

I will come back next time to experience staying overnight in Halong Bay.

Title: Danang Cooking Tour

Title: Hidden Saigon
Description: Linh was our guide on the "Other than Pho" tour. Her sharing of her personal history of leaving Saigon as a child and returning as an adult made it even more interesting and meaningful. We ate at 3 great places, including one that was down an alley and felt like eating with the locals. Our Vietnamese coffee tour was excellent and even those in our party who are not big coffee fans loved the special drinks and education. We also appreciated having the time to shop and seeing a real working market. Having an air conditioned van rather than scooters meant we were cool and safe between stops, which was even better. We would definitely choose this tour or others by the same company. Thanks Linh!
Rank_of_province: Số 90 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Saigon Buddy Tours
Description: There are lots of tours in Ho Chi Minh City, but the Saigon Buddy city tour is a perfect introduction to the city. You sit on the back of a scooter, and the driver takes you on a four-hour tour of various neighborhoods. My friend booked us and she rode with Will, I rode with D. They're nice guys, very smart about the city and were great company. The tour hit highlights like Notre Dame Cathedral, a large marketplace, a gorgeous Buddhist temple, etc. But we also had pauses, like a stop to sample Vietnamese coffe, then a visit in the park to sit and sip lemon tea, and talk about the lifestyle and people of HCM City. And a key part of the fun is riding on the back of that motorbike. Traffic in this city seems to have no rules. But D and Will expertly maneuvered the crazy mix of cars, pedestrians and other scooters. There were a few hairy moments, but that's part of the fun. Don't let the idea of a scooter tour scare you; I'm retirement age and the biggest wuss around, and I loved every minute. So first recommendation: Take this tour. Second tip: Wear sunscreen. Other than that, put yourself in their hands and have a blast.
Rank_of_province: Số 91 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Asian Promise
Description: I Got to eat delicious street food. It was awesome. Loved it. Would really recommend all the tourist to go visit and have a bite.

Title: Bin Touristic
Description: Отдыхала на Фукуоке. Ездила с Анексом, ну в принципе хорошо, отель не плохой. Долго думала с кем ехать с Анексом или самой выбрать. По предыдущим поездкам знаю, как Анекс ломит цены и обманывает в описании экскурсий. Решила сама поехать. Увидела стойку Бин Туристик недалеко от отеля. Менеджер Тимур посоветовал экскурсию "побег из реальности". Впечатления просто невероятные. Гид великолепен. Атмосфера потрясающая. Я очень редко пишу отзывы, но здесь от переполняющих положительных эмоций не смогла сдержаться! Ребята вы молодцы! Спасибо за отличный отдых! Тимуру отдельное спасибо! Не подвёл, всё как рассказал, так и было! В следующий раз только к Вам!!! Всем рекомендую Бин Туристик не пожалеете. 👍😊🤩🤩
Rank_of_province: Số 5 trên 32 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Đảo Phú Quốc

Title: Xpath.Co
Description: I could not be happier with the tour given by An! She was punctual, well organised and knowledgeable of the local area. The tour she gave felt personalised and struck the perfect balance between including important historical and cultural sights from Vietnamese history, as well as providing a contemporary perspective of Saigonese life. It was made all the better for her having a great sense of humour and being genuinely interested in an authentic cultural exchange. If the other guides from the team are anything like An then you are sure to have a lot of fun and I could not recommend the experience highly enough!

Rank_of_province: Số 168 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Công ty Du lịch Lisa's
Description:
Attention ce trip est une arnaque !!! Nous avons réservé avec mon conjoint cette journée et nous ne sommes pas du tout allés à Lan Ha !

Le bus avait 2h de retard, et au bout de 2h de route, nous apprenons que nous allons à Halong... Super surprise... Le chauffeur conduit dangereusement et passe son temps à klaxonner tout en doublant à contre sens.

***Toute la description est mensongère :

"Âge 0-70, 20 pers. maximum par groupe" => c'est faux. Nous étions l'équivalent de 3 bus.

"Arrêt à : Lan Ha Bay, Cat Ba Vietnam" => c'est également faux. Nous sommes allés à la baie d'Halong.
Rendez-vous bien compte que 60$ pour aller à la Baie d'Halong c'est beaucoup trop cher, surtout pour une prestation si médiocre. Partout à Hanoï vous trouverez des 1 day Tour Halong pour 30$.

Le buffet était un infâme, ils vous interdisent d'amener des bouteilles d'eau sur le bateau soi disant pour limiter le plastique, mais ensuite ils vous distribuent des snacks emballés dans du plastique... et le bateau vous facture la bouteille d'eau une fortune...

"En une journée, de nombreuses activités... notamment le vélo, la randonnée..." => c'est faux et encore faux, vous ne ferez pas de vélo, et pas de rando non plus.

"la région la plus isolée" => toujours faux. Vous irez dans la baie d'Halong vous mélanger à une trentaine de paquebot à touristes et faire du kayak parmi 100 autres kayakistes qui tournent en rond dans une eau croupie pleine de detritus.

Agence totalement de mauvaise fois lorsqu'on les a appelé pour demander un remboursement. Selon eux, ils ne proposent pas la Baie de Lan Ha sur une journée mais bien 2 jours. Je partage le screenshot de leur annonce pour leur rafraichir la mémoire...

"nous comprenons vos attentes et concevons avec impatience la journée d'une journée dans la baie de Lan Ha, avec des souvenirs inoubliables.
Entrée – Lan Ha Bay" => il est écrit noir sur blanc dans l'annonce que le tour concerne Lan La. Ne vous faites pas avoir !

Agence totalement frauduleuse, dépensez votre argent ailleurs, ne soyez pas complice de cette arnaque !
Rank_of_province: Số 178 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Phong Nha Locals

Rank_of_province: Số 17 trên 147 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Mr Trung's Traditional Village Tours
Description:
Approached by Trung at a bar in the night market, he showed us books worth of great reviews (turns out he makes you write one at the end of the tour). He picked us up from our hostel but we had to provide our own transport, he doesn't use a car, just his own motorbike. Luckily we had free bicycles with our homestay.
First off was the fishmarket, there was no fish as he starts the tour after they are all sold for the morning (which he neglected to mention when we signed up).
Got to go out in a little fishing boat and use a net to catch fish, great experience, but Trung just sent us out with someone else that he'd paid. Probably worth doing this as a solo activity.
Pottery was next, he managed to talk for so long and still give so little information. The pottery 'class' that he advertises is actually just letting you touch some clay for like 20 seconds (we kept getting shoved off for doing it wrong, but they didn't tell us what we were meant to be making).
Then off to Trungs house, the cooking class was only spring rolls, and he let us cut some beans and carrots for a stir fry. Not very educational about Vietnamese cuisine. Other reviews mention his son running the class, perhaps our experience was very different because Trung himself ran the class. His family also ate separately to us, which was exceptionally awkward, especially as at the end he insisted we pose with his wife and daughter for a photo on his phone (no doubt to advertise the happy tourists to his next victims at the pub).

He seems to drag things out, talks slow, repeats himself a heap, and also drives very slow, presumably to use up time in the 5 hours we paid for.

All in all, perhaps a good experience for a group of tourists looking for a slower day, but with not much actually done or learned, and with no opportunity to explore his 'village,' it was a waste of half a day for a young couple looking for an educational tour.

Side note: he has 2 kittens and a dog called Fat, absolute highlight of the tour (almost worth the 475,000 dong each).
Rank_of_province: Số 34 trên 127 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hội An

Title: Hanoi Scooter Tours
Description: We loved the scooter street food tour so much that we rebooked with Mango and her team for the sightseeing scooter tour too! She was very knowledgeable about the places, temples and other areas that we visited - with local insider information too! Thanks so much to the team for making our visit to Hanoi old qtr so memorable- the scooter tours were just the best, and the drivers very friendly too!! It was perfect for the whole family, teenagers down to our 9 year old who just didn’t want the ride to end!!
Rank_of_province: Số 184 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Mekong Villages
Description: Fabuleux voyage, pays magnifique et varié, les vietnamiens sont adorables et extrêmement accueillants. Le voyage a été organisé absolument comme nous le souhaitions par cette agence, à partir d'une base que nous avions réfléchie (nous devions partir en 2020) mais avec des bons conseils pour supprimer, changer ou rajouter certains points. Si nous devions repartir, nous referions le même périple ! Nos deux guides étaient formidables, en particuliers celui du nord du Vietnam qui était exceptionnel. Tous deux adorables et d'une grande ponctualité. Nous avions choisi de ne faire que le nord et le centre en 12 jours et nous n'avons aucun regret, nous avons déjà vu tellement de belles choses ! Notre priorité était de faire de la randonnée, un peu hors des sentiers battus, cela a été le cas autant dans le Mai Chau que dans le parc de Bach Ma. Nous sommes passé dans des villages très authentiques, avons bien marché et fait du vélo. Nous avons bien sûr visité aussi les sites touristiques (Baie d'Halong terrestre et maritime, Hué, Hoi An, Hanoi) et des temples et pagodes mais nos plus beaux souvenirs sont la rencontre des vietnamiens dans les villages, qui travaillaient pour eux et non pour les touristes et la beauté des paysages de rizières ou des forêts de bambou. Un sans faute !
Rank_of_province: Số 53 trên 154 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: DISCOVERYVIETNAM CO.,TLD
Description:
Một trong những trải nghiệm thú vị nhất mà tôi được thấy, nhìn và cảm nhận.
Hành trình tour bắt đầu với những khung cảnh đẹp đẽ của một hòn đảo xinh đẹp, chúng tôi đi xe máy cảm nhận mùi hương của biển, những khung cảnh bình dị của người dân trên đảo và được đi trekking nhẹ trong Vườn quốc gia.
Chúng tôi bắt đầu hành trình tham quan Vịnh hết sức táo bạo với việc trèo Kayak 2-3km waaaooo thật là thú vị đó có lẽ là điều tôi khó quên. Vịnh Lan hạ rất đẹp, nước trong xanh và mọi thứ xung quanh thật hùng vĩ. Gặp gỡ những con người sống và làm việc trên biển trải nghiệm cuộc sống trên bè nổi và thưởng thức những món hải sản vô cùng tươi ngon ngay trên thuyền. HDV rất nhiệt tình và có trách nhiệm anh ấy luôn quan tâm đến những điều nhỏ nhặt và biết chúng tôi cần gì để cung cấp.
Tôi sẽ quay lại để trải nghieemh thêm những hành trình mới này
Rank_of_province: Số 2 trên 7 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Cát Bà

Title: Serene Garden Cafe - Cooking Class
Description: Een oase van rust in het immens toeristische stadje. Je loopt er zo voorbij maar het is de moeite waard om het kleine gangetje in te lopen. De aangename tuin en vriendelijke bediening maakten dat we vol verlangen uitkeken naar ons eten. We bestelden mango-papaya salade, garnalen in tamarind sauce en gevulde inktvis. De drankjes waren lekker koel. Het smaakte overheerlijk. En het was er leuk vertoeven. Nu de versleten lampionnen nog een keer vervangen en dan is het zicht ook helemaal in de sfeer van Hoi An. Een aanrader!
Rank_of_province: Số 53 trên 167 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hội An

Description:
Tôi biết đến viet flame tour thông qua một người bạn giới thiệu, tôi liên hệ và đặt tour đi hạ long 2 ngày 1 đêm, viet flame tour đã cung cấp cho tôi 1 chuyến đi thật sự tuyệt vời, chắc chắn lần sau tôi sẽ liên hệ lại với viet flame tour để đặt các dịch vụ khác nữa.

Title: Traveling Spoon
Description:
It is always a great way to experience a city and it’s culture when you are able to go into someone’s home and learn to cool with them

Rank_of_province: Số 36 trên 224 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hà Nội

Title: Asia Essence Tours
Description:
I've never been so excited to get home and write a review. Absolutely without a doubt THE BEST tour ever. We travelled from Hanoi, to Danang, to Hoi An, the Phan Thiet, HCMC and the the Mekong Delta with my husband and 7 & 9 year old daughters.
We trawled the internet for weeks to find a great local Vietnamese company for our family adventure holiday and hit the jackpot with Kate and Asia Essence Tours. As soon as I started making enquires Kate responded straight away. I was specific and knew what we wanted: Family Friendly, Private tours & transport, Adventure, Culture, Art, History, Travel, Farms, Poolside, 4-5star and Relaxation in two weeks. I gave Kate my budget (ex international airfares) and she sure delivered beyond our expectations!! She greeted us in person on the first day, gave us a SIM card and almost daily she checked in with us with meticulous details and made sure everything was running smoothly for us. We felt so supported and looked after by Kate and nothing was ever an issue. And her genuine kindness and concern was so comforting when traveling with kids somewhere totally new.
We did our own thing within our itinerary some days but as a family when there was a tour planned by Kate we had a motto 'if Kate planned it, it was going to be great" and it was every time. I think we may have even saved up to 30% on the prices of hotels and tours by booking with Kate also.
No one got sick, at no time did any booking not happen and Kate was always there to see us through.
I have done loads of traveling in my lifetime and this tour company without a doubt is the BEST I have ever felt with.
Look no further Kate at Asia Essence Tours gets 10 out of 10 from us and without a doubt we will be back to Vietnam!
Rank_of_province: Số 155 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Vespa Adventure Tours
Description: So much fun. You see how crazy it is on a scooter but you feel very safe. We did the Saigon night tour. A guide takes you to great places you won’t otherwise see. Unforgettable. And we are 67 yrs old and it was a breeze.
