Title: Danangbycar.com
Description: Cảm ơn công ty đã cho tôi một dịch vụ tốt.Tài xế rất thân thiện đã cho chúng tôi trải nghiệm nhiều món ngon tại địa phương
Rank_of_province: Số 6 trên 88 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Đà Nẵng

Title: The Vietnam Journey Dotcom
Rank_of_province: Số 170 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: LaLa SaPa Trekking Tour
Description:
This homestay was one of the best things we did in Vietnam and the best spring rolls in Vietnam!

We did 2 nights 2 days with Lala and Su and have both said it was one of the best things we did over the 4 week trip.

We hiked 2 days with Su, his knowledge and enthusiasm meant we had amazing fun going through bamboo forests and rice fields.

At night we had dinner with Lala, Su & their family which was tasty and insightful. We also had happy water and played games.

I would recommend Lala's tour to anyone!
Rank_of_province: Số 3 trên 11 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Sapa

Title: Hue Grit Tour
Description: Tour was great - Luke showed us another side of Hue food - every place was a little different but everything was delicious and interesting. We had already tried some of the dishes in the plan so Luke made some on the fly changes to the tour and every dish we ate that night was new to us. Had a blast and highly recommend this tour.
Rank_of_province: Số 25 trên 84 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Huế

Title: Vietnam Travel Tour
Description:
Big David really made sure everything is good from the pick up - van ride - food & ample water provision.

This Tour Guide ( Big David ) is well versed , well read with the history of the places & his command of the English Language is impeccable.

He is one whom you could rely one for real information and comfortable your.
Rank_of_province: Số 33 trên 273 Phương tiện giao thông ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Saigon Adventure Tours
Description: We had a great time with Unicorn on the Mekong 1/2 day tour and Cu Chi Tunnels. He was an excellent guide and so entertaining! Best guide in Vietnam!
Rank_of_province: Số 50 trên 154 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Lela Locals - Hanoi Food Tour
Description: Our guide Jamie was the best!!! We went to atleast 10 different places, safe to say we were stuffed at the end. Wouldn’t have known to try certain foods and especially places, Jamie brought us to the best ones. Couldn’t have asked for a better food tour, thank you!
Rank_of_province: Số 150 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Hanoi Tour Zone
Description: Do not book this way. There is no guarantee. You get a voucher and if tickets are sold out you will not get in. The cost is almost double. Much better to book direct at the theatre. Weekends are busy so you will need to book in advance if your time is limited. Book near the front rows A-E for a closer view. Middle seats best around 10. Seats 18/19 are at the end.
Rank_of_province: Số 149 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Da Nang Tours
Description:
I was on a group tour to Ba Na Hills. The guide(Mr. Phuoc) was extremely friendly! Our guide did a very good job. He quickly found his voice with our team. Hồ Thiên Phước was always kind and patient. He told many stories and stories and also the history of Da Nang, Ba Na Hills, while we were on our way there. These cannot be found online.
This is a full day program. We only came at closing time. I can only recommend it to everyone.
In the next few days, we will also visit the city of HuE under the leadership of Mr. Pouch. We visited the Forbidden City and walked along the Perfume River. We visited Marble Mountain and the shrine of "My Son" sanctuary. We received a lot of interesting and important information.
If you come to Da Nang, don't miss these programs.
Rank_of_province: Số 7 trên 88 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Đà Nẵng

Title: Sky Asia Travel
Description: My friend and I had a great time. We were booked at nice hotels. We enjoyed our tours. Anne/Hoa was very helpful and looked after us the entire time we were in Vietnam. She arranged the free transpo of my friend from Danang to Hội An because she was not feeling well. She also helped me with my pocket WiFi. I highly recommend Sky Asia Travel.
Rank_of_province: Số 13 trên 135 Vui chơi & Giải trí ở Hà Nội

Title: HANOI TOUR
Description: Cao bằng rất đẹp, HDV tốt, dịch vụ ok, homestay sạch đẹp , đồ ăn hơi nhiều thịt, nói chung là ok, sẽ còn quay lại Cao bằng.
Rank_of_province: Số 12 trên 134 Vui chơi & Giải trí ở Hà Nội

Title: Unika Bat Trang Pottery Class
Description: Tôi đã có cơ hội trải nghiệm như một người thợ gốm thực sự, từ bước nặn đất, cho vào lò nung, trang trí....và đó cũng là món quà dành tặng cho chính mình do chính tay tôi làm ra🥰🥰. Một cuối tuần thật thú vị bên những người bạn của tôi. Cảm ơn Unika Bat Trang class. Tôi sẽ giới thiệu cho những người bạn của tôi biết tới trải nghiệm này.
Rank_of_province: Số 9 trên 135 Vui chơi & Giải trí ở Hà Nội

Title: Ninh Binh Travel Office
Description: Dịch vụ tuyệt vời, chúng tôi đã đặt vé xe tại văn phòng ninh binh travel office cho chuyến đi tiếp theo của mình, đặt vé rất dễ dàng, xe đón ngay trung tâm, người điều hành giúp chúng tôi mọi thứ
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 4 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Ninh Hai

Title: Halong bay cruises - To Vietnam Travel
Description: Chúng tôi noia chuyện với bạn Mia qua facebook . Và sau khi bạn dsax tư vấn cho chúng tôi tour du thuyền 2 ngày với tàu ambassador chúng tôi đã quyết định chọn mua gói tour này. Mọi thứ thật tuyệt vời. Tàu rất đẹp và dịch vụ tốt. Cảm ơn bạn mia
Rank_of_province: Số 85 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Can Tho Daily Tours
Description: Thank you, dear Hiên, for being such a wonderful person, giving so much great advices and laughters! Without you, we would've been lost on our first day in Vietnam. The 4-star-rating is only because there could've been more "hidden gems" away from the classical touristic route. In total, the tour was fun and we especially enjoyed all the amazing food that came along.
Rank_of_province: Số 8 trên 22 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Cần Thơ

Title: Indochina Odyssey Tours - Hue Day Tours
Description: Our guide Nguyen Duc Manh ( Manh) was a very enthusiastic guide. We struck an unusually hot day of 39C and Manh ensured we stayed as comfortable as possible. His local knowledge was impressive. Odynovo arranged this leg of the tour with Indochina Odyssey Tours and it was a seamless transition for us. Highly recommend both companies and our guide.
Rank_of_province: Số 29 trên 84 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Huế

Title: Hanoi HomeVisit Tour
Description: We were picked up by a lovely student from Hanoi University form our hotel. Giang was a delight and on the ride to our host family's home she spoke about life in Hanoi. When we arrived at the host family we could not have been more warmly welcomed. We were shown their home and given an insight into their lives and family history that you could never receive by reading a book. The dinner was amazing and the conversation during dinner and after was informative and warm. It was like chatting with old friends. This night will be a night we will never forget.
Rank_of_province: Số 180 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Motorbike Rental Da Nang
Description: Good bike rental service, I rented for a couple of days. The bike is in good technical condition, no complaints. No deposit, reasonable price.
Rank_of_province: Số 16 trên 98 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Đà Nẵng

Title: WhatsupVietnam
Description: Trang An was a great guide with lots of energy and took us to some really good food places. As we had been in Vietnam for 4 weeks already and this was our last day here, she made sure we tried things we still hadn’t discovered in places we would never have thought to go. We tried a good balance of sweet and savoury dishes, topped off with an original recipe egg coffee!
Rank_of_province: Số 16 trên 207 Giải trí về đêm ở Hà Nội

Title: Vietjade Travel
Description: We had a trip with Katie for private tour in Da Nang and Hoi an. Trip only 4days but very highlight. Golden Bridge Hand is fantastic. Thank you tour guide Ms Nhi for the very great job. We will book other tours with Katie and Team
Rank_of_province: Số 176 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: WEAW EXPERIENCE TRAVEL COMPANY
Rank_of_province: Số 114 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Vietnam-Eco-Tours
Description: Cảm ơn Vietnam-Eco-Tours , chúng tôi đã có một tour đến Huế được thưởng ngoạn khung cảnh đẹp nên thơ và được thưởng thức những món ăn mang đậm bản chất vùng miền,Vietnam-Eco-Tours đã cho chúng tôi dịch vụ rất tốt, hướng dẫn chuyên nghiệp và nhiệt tình. Cảm ơn đã mang đến cho chúng tôi những trải nghiệm tuyệt vời .
Rank_of_province: Số 156 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Best Food Tour in Da Nang
Description:
Gửi : Bạn Pin!
Nhắc tới Đà nẵng, chắc hẳn ai cũng nghĩ tới địa điểm du lịch lý tưởng, nơi thành phố sạch, con người văn minh, thân thiện, nơi đồ ăn đa dạng từ dân giã tới đặc biệt.
Với một người thích khám phá cả lịch sử những nơi đi qua, những món ăn nếm được nên việc lựa chọn Danang walking food tour là sự lựa chọn lý tưởng.
Chọn tour này bạn sẽ được chỉ dẫn NTK: Nhiệt tình, Thú vị, Khám phá được đi tới những địa điểm mới, món ăn mới, đặc sản nơi đây, được kết giao với nhiều bạn bè không chỉ am hiểu thêm kiến thực ẩm thực nơi này mà bạn còn được trải nhiệm thật thật nhiều điều hấp dẫn.
Cảm ơn bạn Pin xinh đẹp đã dành trọn thời gian để cùng tớ trải nghiệm, khám phá. Cảm ơn sự dễ thương, thân thiện và cũng đầy duyên dáng. Hẹn gặp bạn một ngày không xa nhé.
Miss you!!
Rank_of_province: Số 19 trên 98 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Đà Nẵng

Title: Vietnam Local Adventures
Description:
Henry est très professionnel et tellement gentil.
Henry est à l'écoute et nous a donné les meilleurs conseils. Nous avons eu la chance de rencontrer sa famille et de partager un moment unique et inoubliable..
Merci Henry et à bientôt j'espère
Rank_of_province: Số 101 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Color Vietnam Travel
Description: The whole experience in itself was the highlight. The tour guide was well educated and kind, she was very thoughtful and always checked in on us. She spoke perfect English also and was full of exciting and insightful information. I stayed at the valley view homestay and I arrived in the morning, the house manager organized our tour within moments. Hung is incredible and helpful and the tour itself was impressive. I had a cultural experience and I left feeling humbled and happy. I would recommend staying here and organzing any tours through Hung. This is a small family business that are welcoming and kind. A huge highlight was the food we had the restaurant we were overwhelmed with a great feast. Everything tasted lovely. 10/10 coming back to the homestay was an absolute blessing. The views are priceless and special. Again I recommend this tour and homestay.
Rank_of_province: Số 88 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Beer Fridge
Description: Spend hours trying out different delicious beers, both outside on the terrace and inside the ice cold fridge. Highly recommend if you want to drink some good beers with friends. 😁 It’s a great experience walking into the fridge and picking out your beer.
Rank_of_province: Số 3 trên 8 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Dương Đông

Title: Faifo Making Village
Description: Mình nhớ nhất là những giây phút ngồi ở nhà hàng cà phê uống cà phê ngắm hoa và nghe nhạc. Không khí tại đây rất tuyệt, những lúc không có khách bỗng trở nên yên tĩnh lạ thường. Nhân viên luôn niềm nở chào đón tôi. Có dịp sẽ quay lại địa điểm này.
Rank_of_province: Số 48 trên 167 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hội An

Title: I Love Asia Tour
Description: We (family of 4 -- kids are 18 and 21) did the motorbike tour in Hue. We had a fantastic time. The guides we the best part -- friendly, knowledgeable and most importantly good drivers. They really went the extra mile to make sure that we enjoyed the tour. Our kids, especially, really connected with them. The 4 guides had different personalities and levels or competence with English. Since we were a group of 4 (and joined for part of the tour by a young couple from Poland), the diversity of the guides worked out well. If you are a smaller group and don't have as "chatty" of a guide, you could be disappointed. Based on the other reviews I've seen, I don't think this is an issue.
Rank_of_province: Số 103 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Con Thoi Loi
Description:
We love that super immersive experience. Especially the motorbike part where you drive inside Ben Tre area and get an authentic taste of Mekong Delta life. The food immersion was so much fun, testing delicious Bo Bon street food in Ben Tre; we couldn’t feel more locals.

Si’s team is super nice.

We strongly recommend this great immersive experience in Mekong Delta.
Rank_of_province: Số 109 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Sonasia Holiday
Description:
Sonasia organised our trip to Vietnam and Cambodia. The recommendations they made for hotels and attractions were great. The drivers and guides turned up on time and were very professional. Some of the guides were really excellent and we will keep in touch via WhatsApp I’m sure.

The Sonasia team were responsive when we wanted to make changes and flexible when we reorganised things. It’s a great service- we’ll worth it.
Rank_of_province: Số 112 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Golden Vietnam Travel
Description:
This was a last minute addition to our existing itinerary , and we couldn't thank enough for being sane to make this decision.
We discussed, we contemplated we had our options in terms whether it has to be SAPA, Ninh Binh or travel further South of Vietnam,
but goodness gracious Thanks to our travel buddy cum assistant more of a Friend I would say, who gave us a very valid reason why it should be NINH BINH.
Even though it was a 1 night stay, we had quite a lot planned in terms of vist and activity. After a 2 hours driver from Old Quarters, we reached Ninh Binh,
hotel room checked and it was just has much what was required comfortable and welcoming.
We left our Hotel with our Guide Tina, who was too excited to show us around share all the possible information of various location that we visited, having
her around acted as a charm and we also did get invited by her for some traditional Vietnamese food at her home stay. Food was delicious, got some home prepared
rice wine to taste and overall a mixed group of people from various part of the world.
cảm ơn bạn Vietnam for beautiful memories...
Rank_of_province: Số 110 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Vietnam Cycle Tours
Description: My group of 5 got a wonderful trip with Lee the tour guide last December. He is very engaging, kind, knowledgable and energetic. We had spent more than 3 weeks with lots of trips taken, met lots of people, but there was no one could even matched his source of infomation. The entire trip was a hit of our voyage to Vietnam and we have now known the truest of the Vietnam War through Lee and the tunnels. Thank you and see you again Lee, very soon
Rank_of_province: Số 26 trên 296 Giải trí về đêm ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: WOW WOW STREET FOOD
Rank_of_province: Số 95 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Asia Unique Travel
Description: Brilliant days in Vietnam. So much covered in such a brief period. Never looked rushed. All was well planned out. The things we did had been great. I especially enjoyed the evenings out. The tour leader of ours was legendary.
Rank_of_province: Số 151 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Vietnam Day Tours - This Is Vietnam
Description:
Whilst in Hanoi my wife and I done 3 tours with This is Vietnam Tours.
1. Street food walking tour
2. Hanoi city half day tour
3 . Tam coc, Mua cave .
We had a different guide for each tour and every one of them was excellent.
They were all Friendly , knowledge and passionate about Vietnam and Hanoi.
On the street food tour we was taken by the company owner , Chinh. We could not of asked for a better or nice guide .
We would like to thank all of them for helping to make our holiday memorable.
Rank_of_province: Số 165 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Vietnam Fast Tours
Description: I'd perfect time ever on the Vietnam tour. Managed to carry in the country 's spotlights into a great level of time. Bach was the best tour leader for the first tour of the mine. Kind, useful, informative and a great time. I cannot thank him sufficient for the experience and it is not one I'll be forgetting some time soon. The transportation was as great as you'd expect. Activities were overall and awesome for the price tag this was 100% worth it
Rank_of_province: Số 45 trên 224 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hà Nội

Title: Viet Odyssey Travel
Description:
We are a family with 6 members who have booked a vacation to Nha Trang in June 2020. Sophie is the travel consultant who advised and booked our flight, hotel and tour services in Nha Trang. She also introduced many places to play and eat in Nha Trang for us.
What an amazing trip and we will definitely recommend Viet Odyssey Travel for our friends and relatives.
Rank_of_province: Số 185 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Keys Of Vietnam
Description: Mình đặt tour đi cùng một vài người bạn nước ngoài của mình để giới thiệu về VN cho bạn. Những tưởng mình là người VN hiểu rõ Vn lắm. Nhưng khi đi cùng bạn hướng dẫn mới thấy rằng VN mình nhiều điều thú vị và đẹp như vậy. Bạn hướng dẫn lại vui vẻ và đặc biệt rất nhiệt tình. Thậm chí còn chỉ cho mình thêm những địa điểm và những nơi ăn uống ngon mà mình chưa khám phá ra. Rất hài lòng.
Rank_of_province: Số 148 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Phu Quoc Street Food Tour - Eat with Locals, Drink with Locals
Description: We booked the tour in a very last minutes, but they was confirmed quickly & very detailed information for where we gonna meet, what to prepare. Our guide Katie was fantastic, she is so sweet & prepared everything for us carefully. We walked by the night market, she explained everything extremely well, we loved the coconut icecream & the pork skewers that are exactly how locals enjoy their food. The seafood hotpot is really good as well, really fresh & we could order something extra for our own choices as well. Their is no pushing at all which is really great. Everything is well organized & really informative. Highly recommended for a great night out in Phu Quoc 👍
Rank_of_province: Số 10 trên 32 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Đảo Phú Quốc

Title: Hanoi Goody Tours
Description:
When arriving in Vietnam we feared the local food a bit and wouldn't bring ourselves into trying it. We booked Huan so we can get iver this fear and it has been the smartest choice we made!
Huan took us to fantastic and tasty Vietnamese restaurants, for food, coffee and deserts. Not only that the food was amazing, Huan made sure to provide important and interesting information regarding the history of Hanoi, Vietnam and the food, which has been both inspiring and interesting, and helped us know the city and the country better.
Thank you Huan for a lovely 4 hours tour that passed by so quickly
Rank_of_province: Số 175 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: HoiAnbyYou
Description:
We were searching for something to eat and quite accidentelly arrived at Lucky's restaurant where he and his family welcomed us very friendly and warmly. He told us that he also offers tours and we booked a very spontaneous trip to a lantern workshop.
The next morning he and his friends picked us up at the homestay and took us first to a silkscreen fabric and then to a small lantern fabric where we also had the opportunity to do some on our own.
The whole tour was very interesting and Lucky and his friends took really good care of us (with fruits and water, yummy)
Some days later he organized a driver to get from Hoi An to My Son. It was a precious experience and we were really happy to get to know him. Nice, friendly and very helpful guy. Thank you so much. ( Also for the honey moon snack :) )
Rank_of_province: Số 29 trên 187 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hội An

Title: New Eyes Travel
Description:
If you are looking for quality and authenticity this tour is for you ! We were in a small group (only one other couple) and we had two guides : Trinh and Moon, who speak a perfect English. They took us through Hoi An countryside, in small villages, far away from all the tourist attractions and we were the only tourists in the area (the villagers even seemed surprise to see us). We visited 3 local families who showed us their handicrafts (I won't spoil you but two of them were about food and it was an interesting and yummy experience !). The two guides actually know these families, it's not a show for tourists : they really share something with us and we got to talk about Vietnamese weddings, ancestors worship, and so many other things !

We highly recommend this bicycle tour if you want to :
- Discover Hoi An off the beaten tracks
- Take your time and talk with local guides about Vietnamese culture
- Eat good things (the lunch was very good too !)
- Meet local villagers
- Experiment traditional handicrafts with smiling people eager to let you try.

Cam on for this amazing day !
Rank_of_province: Số 79 trên 206 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hội An

Title: True Hanoi Food Experience Host - Dan the Man
Description: I met Dan for a morning in the old quarter where he showed me lots of local food and culture. He's super positive and helpful, highly recommend!
Rank_of_province: Số 103 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Free Tours In Hanoi
Description: Well I read about University students guiding tourists to polish their English and I was so amazed by this effort. I tried booking a slot for a solo hoan Kiem lake, the big church and temple of literature tour. Nhung Kim was assigned and I was so happy to interact with her. She was extremely polite and patient with my questions and she showed me everything so well with lots of stories behind. I absolutely loved this experience and will be continuing with her in the coming days in Hanoi. It's a beautiful city with beautiful people. Please don't hesitate to book for these tours and Kim should be the choice of course. She is absolutely lovely. She clicked some amazing pictures for me which would not have been possible if I would have gone alone.
Rank_of_province: Số 172 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Duc Nguyen
Description: The weather is very hot. They pick up us a car and drink eggs coffee and pho. We enjoy outdoor village and handmade hat and incense village
Rank_of_province: Số 14 trên 135 Vui chơi & Giải trí ở Hà Nội

Title: Spring Travel Inn
Description: Amazing tour organization with really good price. Our communication was such easy. We booked our Halong trip there and got a free upgrade to a nicer cruise, no extra charge. They provided with all information relating.
Rank_of_province: Số 29 trên 207 Giải trí về đêm ở Hà Nội

Title: Vietnam Holidays And Tours
Description: 3 days 2 nights in Sapa with hotel. Had a wonderful experience. All booked online, Dawn (the owner) arranged for us to take the over night train, this gave us so much more time there.
Rank_of_province: Số 51 trên 224 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hà Nội

Title: Traveling Spoon
Description: This was one of our most memorable travel experiences to date. Diep and her mom are amazing hosts who generously welcomed us into their home. We helped them prepare several delicious vegetarian dishes and learned about local Danang culture and cuisine. Highly recommended for anyone looking for an intimate experience with locals.
Rank_of_province: Số 6 trên 47 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Đà Nẵng

Title: Ginger Cookery
Address: Thanh Nien Số 33, Tổ 2 Khu 1, Hung Thang, Vịnh Hạ Long 200000 Việt Nam
Description: We really had a great time doing to cooking class with Thuy. The place is very beautiful, surrounded by a garden - very cozy atmosphere. We were allowed choose a menu ourselfes out of five options and it was delicious. Before the class you visit the market, which is so cool to see since you have a local with you. The cooking class itself is a lot of fun and you get so many useful tips. We can't wait to cook all the recepies back home. I can definately recommend you to do Thuy's cooking class, it's a blast!
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 2 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hung Thang

Title: Tra Que Basil Restaurant
Description: tôi rất hài lòng về dịch vụ của bạn, đây là điểm đầu tiên tôi ghé tại hội an tôi sẽ quay lại đây vào dịp sắp tới cùng gia đình.
Rank_of_province: Số 35 trên 187 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hội An

Title: HueDanangtravelcars - Private car with english speaking driver
Description:
Look no further and book with Khánh.

We were a group of 4 adults and 4 children and booked Khánh for 16 days straight as part of our trip through Vietnam.

It could not have been any better. Khánh provided a clean and brand new van with child seats for the little ones. He’s not only a good driver, but also helped with being an interpreter, he went out of his way helping us when we needed medical care for two of our the little children, speaks English very well and he became a friend along the way.

If you’re looking for someone to drive you around in Vietnam I can highly recommend Khánh.
Rank_of_province: Số 24 trên 107 Phương tiện giao thông ở Huế

Title: SecretEATS Culinary & Cocktail Experiences
Description: I've had the pleasure of taking part in more than one Secret Eats experience, it's truly a pleasure and the planning that goes into each experience is unmatched. A magical evening and loved every minute of it.
Rank_of_province: Số 6 trên 43 Vui chơi & Giải trí ở Đà Nẵng

Title: Vietnam Funny Travel
Description: Tour đi dịch vụ tuyệt vời …. Các khâu tổ chức tốt hài lòng. Đặc biệt hdv luôn chu đáo và rất kinh nghiệm.
Rank_of_province: Số 115 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Simply Toan
Description:
Toan is so much more than a guide.
He is so easy-going, friendly and easy to adapt, that it really is hard to imagine anyone not having a great time with him!
He did so much more than initially agreed, kept his plan very flexible to ensure we will really enjoy and kept giving us useful information through the day.
We spent amazing time with him, trying traditional food, hiking, having boat tour.
Also, the fact that his tours are private, makes it so much more personal experience, where you can focus on what is important to you, not large group of people you don’t even know.
Highly recommended!!!
Rank_of_province: Số 190 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Hội An Eco Tour and Papa's Cooking Class
Description: In our Hotel we were offered a cooking class!.We got picked up and we realised that we had a private tour as we were the only guests. We had a wonderful morning with Long and his sister Tuyêt! He took us to the local market and showed us fresh herbs, vegetables and fish. Then he brought us to his restaurant. We had a short boat trip an a bamboo boat. That was fun! After that we were pulled into the Vietnamese Art of cooking. Tuyêt was a perfect and passionate instructor. The food we cooked was delicious! We felt like being guests in their home. We highly recommend you not to miss this wonderful experience!
Rank_of_province: Số 60 trên 167 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hội An

Title: Cyclo Resto - Day Tours
Description: Was a little boring, I thought our guide that was riding the bike was going to speak English, but was not the case , smoking all day was a little sickening aswell, only stopped at 2 places and rode down main traffic roads👎 was not my tour at all and was very overpriced! Won’t be back! Also was a mix up with hotels so arrived late and was also not 3 hours as specified.
Rank_of_province: Số 23 trên 147 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: ForTomorrow Travel
Description:
While I was in Singapore, a lovely girl I met at a hostel recommended me to contact Choung for my travels around Hanoi. She told me he would be able to help me out to sort bookings and would advise me with better than my hotel. I contacted Choung and all turned out to be true, he booked the Halong bay cruise (with Oriental Sails) at a fraction of the price of what my hotel offered me and given that he was away of Hanoi he sent a friend of his to help me out to sort some things (like getting a SIM card). By the time I spoke to him I had booked my train and hotel in Sapa which I regret because he had better prices as well.

I highly recommend his services!
Rank_of_province: Số 191 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Nirvana Beach Club (ex Line Up Bar)
Address: 122 Nguyễn Đình Chiểu, Ham Tien, Phan Thiết 800000 Việt Nam
Description:
Tôi và bạn vào từ lúc vào club khi bạn head bar đưa menu và không nói bất kỳ tiếng nào cũng như không hỏi khách dùng món gì. Chúng tôi ngồi đợi khoảng 30 phút cũng không thấy bất kỳ bạn nhân viên nào ra lấy order dù bạn tôi đã chủ động lại gọi món vẫn bị bạn headbar và các bạn nhân viên ngó lơ.

Thái độ phục vụ thì quá tệ và coi thường khách hàng. Sẽ không bao giờ quay trở lại cũng như recommend bạn bè và đối tác đừng đến đây.
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 5 Giải trí về đêm ở Ham Tien

Title: CLU Cocktail Bar
Address: 06 Tống Duy Tân, Hà Nội 100000 Việt Nam
Description: Ấn tượng đầu tiên với Clu là hôm guest shift, mặc dù quy mô quán nhỏ nhưng mọi người hôm ấy vui vẻ rất quây quần. Và từ hôm đầu tiên ấy mình đã có 1 địa điểm tới lui về đêm thường xuyên :))
Rank_of_province: Số 30 trên 207 Giải trí về đêm ở Hà Nội

Title: Cu Chi Adventure Tour
Description: We really enjoyed our time for the lunch cooking in this peaceful farmstay. Mrs Ba family was very friendly and attentive. The food was amazing. Loved it
Rank_of_province: Số 24 trên 147 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Hue Coolmate Tour
Rank_of_province: Số 32 trên 84 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Huế

Title: Hanoi Private Tour Guide
Description:
Sophie was a great guide for me Hanoi showed me with great patience the different memorable and interesting corners of this city.
She is kind, nice and smart girl, if you have the chance ask for their lovely guide.
Rank_of_province: Số 53 trên 224 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hà Nội

Title: Tran Private Tours
Rank_of_province: Số 63 trên 167 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hội An

Title: Hanoi Daily Tours
Description: Must do the trip if you’re in the North of Vietnam and enjoy scenic treks. The tour group was perfectly sized to mingle over the 2 days. Food was great and the homestay was very clean. The people at the hotel in Sapa are really accommodating as well.
Rank_of_province: Số 194 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Hoa Tuc Cooking Class
Description:
i think the cooking class is a bit overrated.

my friend and I chose the package with the market tour. the tour is very short, like 30 mins, without an immersive experience, just the chef pointing here and there and telling us what the ingredients are, but most of them are unrelated to what we are cooking.

if you cook occasionally, do not expect to get too much out of the class. the tasks in the class are super simple, like piling off the skin of carrots, and chopping things. most of the ingredients were pre-prepared by the team (seasoning like garlic is all cut for us, chicken is pre-cut, etc.), so we did not need to do much. The chef also showed us how to check if the chicken was cooked (if you cook, it is something you know). and the chef was gone in between the preparation/cooking of each dish.

they have morning and afternoon classes, i feel like it's more like a formulated business that they run every day over again.

Although it was nice learning to make Vietnamese food, do not expect too much.
Rank_of_province: Số 25 trên 147 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Ha Long Tour and Service
Description: had a chance to savor the famous seafoods including crabs and shrimps in this wonderful place or try some specific dishes such as clay pot seafood soup, dried seafood and shrimp paste fried with egg.
Rank_of_province: Số 195 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Êm Ấm Cooking Class
Address: 399 Au Co, Tay Ho, Ha Noi, Hà Nội 100000 Việt Nam
Description: To start I was supposed to be picked up in a car - they rocked up on a motorbike needless to say not off to a good start. When I arrived the chef was not there yet and Huang who was the interpreter took me on a tour of the market which was the highlight. Got back to the restaurant and the chef still wasn’t there so I got to work with an apprentice who was obviously just starting. I got to ‘chop’ and watch, which was the extent of my cooking class. The pancake mixture was packet. The room upstairs we used to cook was messy and untidy - goodness knows about the cleanliness- would definitely not recommend- worst cooking class ever!!
Rank_of_province: Số 54 trên 224 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hà Nội

Title: Goda Bar & Restaurant Cooking Class
Address: 308 Cửa Đại, Hội An 880000 Việt Nam
Description:
In questo Hotel non hanno il minimo senso dell'ospitalità, i proprietari si ritengono superiori ai loro clienti al punto di definirli degli sprovveduti che non conoscono neanche le norme elementari nella gestione della cucina. Uso e abuso di prodotti surgelati e di scarsa qualità. Ogni volta che io e/o altri clienti abbiamo evidenziato la scarsa qualità del cibo ci è stato sempre risposto che noi non avevamo esperienza nel settore. Faccio presente che personalmente sono circa dieci anni che trascorro un periodo di vacanze a Riccione mentre altri componenti la comitiva vi si recano da venti anni e oltre; forse c'è qualcosa che non va in questo Hotel.
Il giorno del nostro arrivo, a me ed a mia moglie è stata assegnata una "suite"( tale è stata definita dal proprietario) che in un armadio a muro situato a capo del letto fungeva da deposito di materiale dell'Hotel e lo spazio per muoversi era estremamente ridotto. Il giorno seguente, a seguito delle nostre rimostranze, ci hanno trasferito in una stanza più grande. Abbiamo soggiornato tredici notti, le lenzuola sono state sostituite il giorno precedente alla nostra partenza, la stessa cosa è avvenuta per molti dei componenti della comitiva (circa quaranta persone). Esperienza assolutamente da non ripetere per quanto ci concerne!
Rank_of_province: Số 66 trên 167 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hội An

Title: Hue Local Tour
Description:
We usually do not review tours, but this time we had to. We had such an amazing evening with Ngoc. She introduced us with so much passion to Vietnamese food, culture and history. We had a lot of delicious dishes, which all were explained by Ngoc. She told us a lot of details of the meals, explained us the ingredients and how to eat the meals.
Ngoc took care of us, if we were friends since long time ago. Her passion for the tour, the Vietnamese cuisine and the country were present all the time.

Thank you so much for this incredible evening!
Rank_of_province: Số 33 trên 84 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Huế

Title: Smart Asia Travel
Description:
My small group of five had a great experience with Smart Asia Travel on a customized tour of Vietnam and Cambodia. Duong handled the booking with detail and care and Tu, Huyền and Chhiev guided with knowledge, care and enthusiasm. In Vietnam, we explored historic Hanoi, experienced the breathtaking sites of Halong bay including kayaking and cave hiking, immersed ourselves into New Years in Ho Chi Minh City and took in the Mekong Delta by water, on foot and by tuk tuk. And in Cambodia we explored Siem Reap, especially Angkor Wat and Angkor Thom and explored the floating fishing village on Tonle Sap Lake.
All the plans were made by Smart Asia Travel including flights, transfers, hotels and guided excursions.
Smart Asia Travel is first-class and delivered exactly what we requested and more.
Girl Travel Tours highly recommend this local agency and plan to send more groups their way.
Rank_of_province: Số 17 trên 135 Vui chơi & Giải trí ở Hà Nội

Title: Lavyla Nha Trang
Description:
What a fantastic day out! Would absolutely recommend this to anyone. It was a lot of fun, helpful staff and what a great atmosphere with dancing, singing, beer, lunch and a great big slide.
Parasailing, jet skiing was also available.
We were picked up from our hotel and dropped off, excellent communication.
Thank you to all the staff, for an amazing day out
Rank_of_province: Số 5 trên 58 Phương tiện giao thông ở Nha Trang

Title: Sinners Room
Address: 104 Nam Kỳ Khởi Nghĩ Phường Bến Nghé, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 700000 Việt Nam
Description: Mình được một người bạn giới thiệu nghe nói shisha trên này ngon ko đâu bằng, củng tò mò lên thử thì thiệt là mùi rất thơm và đậm đà, không giống shisha bình thường! Phục vụ và nhân viên cũng rất tốt...nhất định mình sẽ quay lại đây thường hơn⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Rank_of_province: Số 47 trên 296 Giải trí về đêm ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: What's Up Vietnam (SupV)
Description: Trước giờ tôi là một đứa con gái chẳng bao giờ động tay vào chuyện bếp núc nấu ăn cho gia đình bởi vì tôi nghĩ rằng đó thật là một công việc tẻ nhạt. Sau đó tôi có quen một người bạn, người bạn đó đã rủ tôi đi tham gia chung lớp dạy nấu ăn của cô Yến. Sau khi kết thúc khóa học, tôi nghĩ rằng tại sao tôi lại không nhận ra việc được nấu ăn cho những người thân yêu của mình là một việc hạnh phúc như vậy từ trước nhỉ. Cô đã không chỉ dạy tôi cách nấu ăn mà còn dạy cho tôi cả những điều hay lẽ sống và những tình cảm chân thành nữa. Cảm ơn cô rất nhiều!
Rank_of_province: Số 198 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: EXO Travel Vietnam
Rank_of_province: Số 120 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Fill the map with Jude
Description:
Me and my girlfriend booked both the coffee tour and the Ha Giang Loop with Jude on one of our first days in Vietnam and we immediately knew that he wasn't just your average tour guide.
as a tour guide, he had some really interesting views on the Vietnamese culture and took us through a fascinating journey. As a person, he was chill, funny and overall just the coolest guy to hang out with.
We had an amazing time traveling with him and we hope you'd be smart enough to do the same.
Rank_of_province: Số 199 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: MK Transport & Tours

Title: Grace’s tour
Description: Cảm ơn em đã book phòng, hành trình tour cho anh nhé, lịch trình tuyệt vời. Nhân viên nhiệt tình, tàu mới. Mọi thứ rất chuyên nghiệp. Hương rất nhiệt tình hướng dẫn mn .Chúc em có nhiều khách hàng yêu thương nhé.
Rank_of_province: Số 8 trên 54 Phương tiện giao thông ở Đảo Phú Quốc

Title: Cyclo Cooking Class
Address: 168 Đường Ven Hồ Thụy Khuê, Quận Tây Hồ, Hà Nội 10000 Việt Nam
Description: Thức ăn ôi thiu rất mất vệ sinh, nhân viên ý thức tồi, thật là kinh tởm. khuyên mọi người không nên đến đây
Rank_of_province: Số 57 trên 224 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hà Nội

Title: Jigger Cocktail & Wine Bar
Address: 59 Nam Ngư, Hà Nội 100000 Việt Nam
Description:
What a great place ! The cocktails are not the usual “run of the mill” variety. They use various herbs and unusual ingredients… no tropical fruit here !
We had the 1999 and Sparking Snowball cocktails… delicious! My friend requested a Porn Star Martini ( not on the menu) nothing was too much trouble, they mixed their version for her… a pear liqueur was used and it amazing ! The staff are really friendly and helpful, the atmosphere relaxed and cosy. The owner mixes the cocktails and it’s enthralling to watch him at work. He’s clearly a passionate and enthusiastic mixologist . This quirky little bar is really popular and it’s easy to see why. Definitely one not to be missed whilst in Ghent.
Rank_of_province: Số 35 trên 207 Giải trí về đêm ở Hà Nội

Title: Viaje Vietnam Asia
Description: Soy Silvia Chilena adulto Mayor y viaje sola a partir del 16 de mayo 2023 por un mes a Vietnan Camboya y Thailandia ,tour organizado por " Viaje Vietnan Asia"agradesco al equipo de sus Profesionales que me organizaron acompañaron y apoyaron durante todo el viaje en forma optima, haciendo de este el mejor viaje que he realizado , y junto con esto la belleza de esos lugares lo hacen Inolvidable gracias a la Agencia y a su excelente Equipo atte Silvia
Rank_of_province: Số 121 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Tung's Kitchen Cooking Class
Address: 2 Hàng Bông Phường Hàng Gai - Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội 100000 Việt Nam
Description: Tôi đã từng đến quán ăn và thích món ăn ở đây. Tôi biết quán có tổ chức lớp học nên đã đăng kí để có thể nấu món ngon tại nhà cho gia đình.
Rank_of_province: Số 58 trên 224 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hà Nội

Title: Hội An Cooking Class
Description:
Wonderful experience. We chose this class because of the menu. We were 8 at the class, they picked us up from our hotels with a bus. First stop was the food market, where the chef made all the purchases for the day and explained some things, without us being involved as much as we wanted.
A small ride with a boat across the river and then directly to the cooking farm. Everybody had his own space and ingredients to cook. She gives explanations and demonstrates and then you cook the dish on your own. Everything was tasty! At the end you get the recipes and a small gift! Then follows a ten minutes ride through the water coconut fields, nothing special. At the end a ride home with the bus. Our chef Tin Tin was polite, helpful and professional helping us all the way but we missed some communication skills, smiling is always a good start! I would recommend it because of the menu and the professionality!
Rank_of_province: Số 68 trên 167 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hội An

Title: Quy Nhon Cooking Classes
Description: Such a great way to get to know the culture and flavor of Vietnam. We had a great time! Highly recommended!
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 3 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Quy Nhơn

Title: Tour With Hill Tribes in HaGiang
Description:
We had a wonderful time coming here ! We had the opportunity to experience the local life and to discover a lot about their culture and traditions. And the tea we tasted was very good !
Thank you again for hospitality and generosity.
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 1 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hà Giang

Title: Ngon Vietnam Cooking Class
Address: 46A Hàng Bún, Hà Nội 100000 Việt Nam
Description:
私はいくつも食物アレルギーがあるので、プライベートのクラスが良かったため、こちらを受講しました。
英語のクラスですが、先生はとてもフレンドリーで、楽しく、分かりやすく教えてくれます。
また、食材も、安全なものを選んで提供してくれます。
レシピも頂けるので、帰ってからも再現可能。
とてもオススメの料理教室です。

I took this private cooking class because I have some food allergic.

Teacher Justin had a lot knowledge and very kindness for my problem.
He is very Professional and friendly person.
He use only safe and clean ingredients for cooking class.
I think this is very important thing.

I heard that some other cooking class is just watching for teacher's works.
But we can cook all recipe in this class.
We cooked 3 kinds menu. Everything was easy and delicious.

Teacher Justin had unique experience. He worked on cooking TV shows staff. One of special guest was Anthony Bourdain.
I like Anthony's TV show and we talked a lot about food and culture.
This moment was not just Cooking class. It was very special experience for me.

I highly recommend This class.
If you wants special experience for cooking class.

Thank you Justin. You are Great teacher!!
Rank_of_province: Số 60 trên 224 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hà Nội

Title: Magical Mystery Tour Nha Trang - Viet Garden Cooking
Address: 3/35 Trần Quang Khải, Nha Trang 650000 Việt Nam
Description:
Today we enjoyed a fabulous day with Dat of the Viet Garden Cooking Class. It truly was a real “field to fork” experience.
We visited the herb and vegetable growers, watched the coconut milk being extracted from coconuts, shredded the rice noodles; then went o the local market to buy the rest of the ingredients.
At the cooking school, the facilities are clean and very welcoming, and being outdoors, there is a nice natural breeze and ceiling fans to keep you cool.
We got to prepare the ingredients, cook the food (and of course eat it!) : pork & prawn spring rolls with chilli dipping sauce, marinaded fish in lemongrass, shallots & fish sauce, coconut chicken curry with rice and noodles.
We really loved that we got to see the origin of every aspect of the ingredients we were using.
Highly recommended - Dat is such a warm and welcoming person, even my husband who normally does not cook absolutely loved the whole experience
Rank_of_province: Số 3 trên 12 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Nha Trang

Title: Công ty Du lịch Athena Việt Nam
Description:
It was very professionally organized. Our guide, Amy was outstanding! We loved our date so much. Foods on cruise were so delicious and beautiful view of cruise on Saigon River.
Thank you Amy and Athena Travel Vietnam.
Rank_of_province: Số 122 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Viet Nam Vibes
Rank_of_province: Số 123 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Highway4 Cooking Classes
Address: 5 Hàng Tre Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội 100000 Việt Nam
Description: This cooking class was really amazing. We had a wonderful time with the very nice chef and with Nam, who is the heart and soul of this great restaurant. We cooked delicious food and really learned hands on how to prepare it at home. We even got the recipes in the end. We had fun cooking and then we could enjoy our homemade meals, which was a great experience. This cooking class is definitly a must do on your trip to vietnam. You shouldnt miss this great experience.
Rank_of_province: Số 61 trên 224 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hà Nội

Title: VietMate
Description:
We arrived in Vietnam, (Ho Chi Minh) for our 3 week trip with a loose plan of travelling to Hanoi then working our way back to Ho Chi Minh, We had booked the first two nights accommodation, Internal flights and a Halong Bay Cruise. With nothing else booked we contacted Minh and asked if he could organise tours (Meekong Delta, Chu Chi Tunnels, Ninh Binh, Phong Nha Cave, waterfalls, Ba Na Hills, the Marble Mountain and Hoi an). Minh arranged all accommodation, travel, guides, meals and activities to suit exactly what we wanted to get out of the trip. The highlights of this trip where definitely all the great places we visited and the icing on the cake was the Cyclo ride around Hue with Minh and dinner at Banana Mango. The conclusion of our Vietnam visit was made complete by enjoying lunch with Minh in Danang before flying to Ho Chi Minh to get our flight back home.
Huge thanks to Minh, his family and his team for making our trip Awesome.
Rank_of_province: Số 14 trên 88 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Đà Nẵng

Title: Local Tours ASIA
Rank_of_province: Số 125 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Hanoi Walking Street Food Tour
Description: Nhân viên và hướng dẫn viện nhiệt tình.tôi đến địa chỉ số 6 bát đan-hoàn kiếm-hanoi để tham gia tour đi bộ và thưởng thức đồ ăn đường phố,thật tuyệt vời.
Rank_of_province: Số 207 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: VIETCAM HOLIDAYS
Description: Don met us when we arrived in Chau Duc off our fast ferry service from Phnom Penh. Very affable and easy to get on with from the start. All through our tour he imparted knowledge and general information and also seemed to enjoy showing us around. Always on time and usually with a ready smile. Also good company. He picked a couple of restaurants out for our evening meal and we were very pleased with them both. I can highly recommend him as either a guide for a few days or a city tour around Ho Chi Minh.

Title: Passion Cooking Class
Address: 32 Bát Sứ Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội 100000 Việt Nam
Description:
First you are greeted by Charlie the chef with a cup of artichoke tea beside a gorgeous view of the lake. You are then taken to the local market to get the ingredients, Charlie was very informative and knowledgeable on the local produce and was happy to answer all of my questions. You are then taken for a refreshing drink of sugar Kane juice and then back to the kitchen to get cooking! Charlie is a great chef and an even better teacher! He was very patient while I failed at deep frying spring rolls with chopsticks! You then get to eat the delicious food you have cooked, Charlie presented it to me on a big platter while saying the happy birthday tune hahaha! Thank you Charlie and everyone else for an unforgettable authentic Vietnamese cooking experience :)

Anna
Rank_of_province: Số 62 trên 224 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hà Nội

Title: Go Indochina Tours - Day Tours
Description: Halong bay was beautiful and the holiday organised from the time we landed to back to the airport was very well organised. Our guide Jackie was specially very helpful, not only showed us the regular sightseeing tours but also helped us taste local food and helped us without any expectation even after duty hours so we three girl friends would have a smooth hassle free trip.
Rank_of_province: Số 209 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: OPOX Authentic Experience
Description: I had an excellent time on the afternoon city tour with Trien. He was not only insightful and knowledgeable, but also very accommodating and polite. We visited Long Son Pagoda and Vinh Luong fishing village, with plans for Po Nagar Towers but it was closed unfortunately. We also stopped at Nha Trang beach. The best part is the tour is completely at your discretion; the itinerary is up to you and you can spend as much or as little time at each destination given the time permitted. Would definitely recommend this tour for first time visitors to Nha Trang :)
Rank_of_province: Số 9 trên 26 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Nha Trang

Title: Connek Trip
Description:
Perfect tour,
I had a great experience, Ha Noi food is very delicious.
Because the weather is hot, plz go in the evening or eary morning
thanks Connek trip
Rank_of_province: Số 20 trên 135 Vui chơi & Giải trí ở Hà Nội

Title: Kin Trekking Tours Sapa
Description:
We had the best time trekking for two days in Sapa. Kin has arranged everything for us, transport from Hanoi to Sapa, homestay, tickets for the cable car and areas which we visited, water, breakfasts, lunches, everything.
I have contacted Kin on Facebook, and he responded very fast and answered all of my numerous questions. He wanted to create a plan which suited us the best.
We arrived at Sapa at 4 am and Kin got to the station to pick us up, we went to the homestay where we could shower, sleep and eat breakfast.
On the first day, we hiked to Cat Cat Village, had lunch in Sapa town and after lunch went to Fansipan by cable car.
On the second day, we walked through rice terraces, Y Linh Ho village where we also had lunch. After lunch, we continued our walk to Lao Chai and Ta Van villages.
During the day Kin asked us multiple times which route suits us better - if we want the route which goes up and down or the one where you walk on the road.
The price was fair. The food was great. The homestay - GreenHouse Sapa is also really nice. The night bus from Hanoi to Sapa was also much more comfortable than we expected.

I can not imagine a better tour guide, we have experienced Sapa, learned a lot about their culture and seen beautiful nature. If we haven't booked a tour guide, we wouldn't be able to see so much and hike on such interesting routes.

Thank you Kin, and I would recommend him to everybody!
Rank_of_province: Số 4 trên 11 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Sapa

Title: Hoi An Wanderlust Tours
Description: I booked the cham Island snorkeling tour and basket boats through this company and they were very communicative throughout to ensure I got the experience I paid for. Definitely recommend this company for your tours.
Rank_of_province: Số 9 trên 41 Vui chơi & Giải trí ở Hội An

Description: i am very excited about this ride everything is good and happy to sit on the basket to dance after that i try sweet coconut soup its really good.

Title: Private Dinner with Local Family in Dong Hoi
Description:
After an amazing (but exhausting) 2 days trek to, in, around and back from Hang En cave, we decided to spend a few days in Dong Hoi.

Our bike tour - led by Thai - was 100% the highlight of our time in the city. Thai is charming, knowledgeable, fun and has an excellent grasp in English.

He steered us well clear of tourist traps, leading us to local haunts, fish markets and Bijou coffee bars.

We ate and drank extremely well for a very small amount of money. The tour also ran over 4 hours long, and Thai would've gone on longer if we hadn't had to leave.

We highly recommend this tour to anyone planning to spend a few days in Dong Hoi. You won't regret it.
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 4 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Đồng Hới

Title: Vietnam Local Friend
Description: Before that i never come vietnam, through my friend, i come Vietnam to travel with my husband and my kids, i had found Vietnamese local tours and they show me how amazing Vietnam, i've been on Sai gon, my Vietnamese tour guide so friendly and kinds, we had good experience about views, locals game, and enjoy stress food like pho bo, banh trang tron, banh mi, so delicious, i think im in love with amazing Vietnam i hope one day i will be back Vietnam
Rank_of_province: Số 44 trên 273 Phương tiện giao thông ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: ELON FARMSTAY
Description:
Our farm stay was incredible, a highlight of our Vietnam trip. I would love to visit again the next time I am in Vietnam. Jenny and her family made us feel so comfortable and at home from the moment we arrived. We were given a very interesting and informative insight into life in their village. Jenny and her husband are very knowledgeable about everything in their village and so happy and proud to share.

The food was incredible. The accommodations are very comfortable. It really felt like hanging out at a friend's place. I love the fact that the tour can be customized to your individual interests.
Rank_of_province: Số 4 trên 7 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Đà Lạt

Title: Red Flame Cooking Class
Address: 21C Hàng Buồm Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội 100000 Việt Nam
Description:
I was very disappointed of my cooking class with Red Flame in Hanoi.
We were not given a choice of the meal to prepare, the chief « suggested » us what to cook because those recipes were the easiest and quickest for us « to cook at home ». We understood only at the end that we had in fact a choice between a few recipes. Overall, all we did was chop a few vegetables and roll 2-3 spring rolls. He actually cooked, seasoned and served everything for us. He insisted for us to « ear while it is hot » while he prepped the veggies for the next plate.
Overall, introduction, visit to the market, cooking and eating took ~1h30.

I learned absolutely nothing.

It was obvious the guy giving the class didn’t want to be there at all.
Rank_of_province: Số 64 trên 224 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hà Nội

Description: Je cherchais une agence locale pour découvrir le Vietnam durant mes vacances d'été et j'ai été agréablement surpris par la qualité des prestations et l'organisation du séjour. Un conseiller toujours a l'écoute des attentes et au final un voyage inoubliable : j'ai pu faire des rencontres extraordinaires avec les locaux, découvrir la nourriture Vietnamienne, visiter les sites touristiques et naturels, bref j'ai adoré !

Title: See You In Viet Nam
Description:
It was an amazing experience. We got to know Hoi An from the perspective of a person living here. We got to experience a vegan community we would have never found on our own and saw parts of the town hidden to the normal tourist.

The food stops were unbelievably delicious and the story's provided with them made you feel connected to the people and to the food they are offering.

The guide was very helpful before and after the tour and provided us with tips for running and shopping in town that were great.

We also had stops in between were we learned about the history and development of Hoi An.

We got to talk a lot and learned many things about living and life in Vietnam.

We highly recommend booking this tour, doesn't matter if vegan or not. An amazing experience that we will remember.

Title: Phu Quoc Food Tour
Description:
Very bad organised. Very overpriced.
Only 15 min. before arriving at the meeting point we were informed to take an new taxi to another meeting point. The first meeting point was a nice beach club were we should start with our food tour and our first meal. Instead of this we we send to a local very cheap restaurant eating our first soup, herbs, tofu and pork. The guide told us this was his second time he was tour guide. The second place we went we ate our second portion of soup and some rolls, the third place we visited again soup. Two of the three dishes were originally from Hà Nội. The “tour” was closed by eating/drinking a kind of ice coffee and a cup with a drink made of the jackfruit. We spend over $50 for something wich would cost less than $10. We expected some more in tasting not the normal “every-corner” street food for this amount of money.

Title: Dao Cooking Classes
Description:
דאו ובעלה אספו אותנו מהמלון וכבר מהרגע הראשון שנפגשנו עם דאו אי אפשר היה לפספס את שמחת החיים והאנרגיות שלה שתרמו רבות לחוויה. התחלנו עם קניות בשוק המקומי שהיה מלווה בהסברים והיה מעניין מאוד. המשכנו עם שיט בין עצי הקוקוס שכלל ניסיון דייג סרטנים, הכנת תכשיטים, פרחים, בעליי חיים, צפצפות וכתר מעליי קוקוס והיה נפלא ובעיקר מצחיק! דאו מאוד מוכשרת, חייכנית, מלאת אנרגיות ומצחיקה ודאגה שיהיה לנו כיף לאורך כל השהות עימה. אחרי השיט עצירת התרעננות לקפה ושתיה ומשם הליכה של 5 דקות לביתה והתחלנו בסדנה.
המקום נקי, משפחה מקסימה, דאו דאגה לשים לנו מוסיקה לבחירתנו, הסדנה היתה מלווה בהסברים נהדרים ולמתכונים בשפה שלנו. נהנינו מאוד, צחקנו בלי סוף, האוכל היה מדהים ובשפע.
חוויה מדהימה, ממליצה בחום! לא לפספס!
Rank_of_province: Số 77 trên 167 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hội An

She is kind, funny and speaks great English. He shares his knowledge from the bottom of her heart. Helped me to take beautiful photos and videos for memory. This is an unforgettable trip. Thank you Linh for the joyful emotions! 🤗❤️

Title: Vietnam Food Safari
Description:
Pedr collected me from my Hotel in the afternoon. I was his sole passenger that day.
Very nice guy and good company. Genuine ex-US Army 1963 Jeep was great fun!
Unfortunately, I had developed a slightly delicate stomach during the day but he was very helpful.
First stop was a local drinks stall where he got me an interesting lime juice drink. it was great for settling my stomach. The market was fascinating. Even though I live in Hong Kong and am used to Wet markets, this was more reminiscent of Asia 30 years ago!
With live frogs, eels, great looking fresh fish.
Lots of different meats. Great looking Pork Belly, Pigs ears, every part. All legal!
We had a delicious Viet 'pancake' on the traditional little red stools. No idea what was in it, but very good. Then a more traditional deep fried Banana pancake, which was also helpful in calming my inside.
I did not want to risk too much, so I declined his offer a fish restaurant.
Instead, he took me on a trip in the jeep to the lady Buddha, which was great in the Jeep.
On the way back, we stopped at a local Pub for a Beer and some 'drinking' snacks.
Then off to the Night market. This was more touristic, less of a local Market, but located next to a fabulous Buddhist Temple in full Prayer mode.
So many food stalls here of every description. Even 2 Australian guys making Pizza!
We tried a very delicious Viet dessert. Like poached Quail eggs in individual deep fried corn baskets. Very nice indeed. And lots of good conversation about his home, Freemantle.
My only regret is not feeling well enough to fully try all the different dishes he showed me, but he did his best. Entirely my own fault.
Rank_of_province: Số 25 trên 98 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Đà Nẵng

Title: Traveling Spoon
Description: this was a perfect experience! Linh picked us up from the hotel and we went to the market, she explained various ingredients and we purchased all the foods we needed for the meals we chose to make (so many options!). her home is beautiful, the kitchen is luxurious!! she explained well, we received a cookbook too so we can recreate what we learned. she was nice and the food was delicious!! absolutely recommend this experience!
Rank_of_province: Số 79 trên 167 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hội An

Title: My Son Haven Farm
Description: Highly recommend! It was packed full of knowledge and adventure. Plus great food after our quad bike tour! Thank you for a wonderful day
Rank_of_province: Số 39 trên 187 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hội An

Title: Hue Photo Tours
Description: Super spontan hatte Mr Bean den ganzen Tag Zeit für eine Fototour im näheren Umland von Hue mit mir. Mit seinem Motorroller holte er mich direkt am Hotel ab und wir fuhren kreuz und quer durch Reisfelder, über Brücken, schlenderten durch Märkte, zum Strand und zurück durch die Lagunen. Natürlich ist er mehr ein Tourguide als ein vollausgebildeter Fotograf. Das war aber von Anfang an klar. Er hatte viele hilfreiche Tipps und besonders gut war, dass er die Gegend und die Möglichkeiten zu guten Fotomotiven kannte. Er war super umsichtig, sehr freundlich und machte einfach einen guten Job. Bei einem guten, entspannten Miteinander und dazu noch mit einem der in der Gegend zuhause ist und somit einen guten Zugang zu den Menschen hat, gelingen einfach auch super Bilder. Ich bin sehr zufrieden.
Rank_of_province: Số 29 trên 107 Phương tiện giao thông ở Huế

Title: ezSaigon
Description: This was such a great tour! The food was the best food I have had in Saigon, most dishes were dishes I’d never heard of or would have been able to find on my own. The guide was really friendly and insightful. This tour is really good value for money and I would happily do this tour if I’m ever in Ho Chi Minh city simple because the food was incredible!
Rank_of_province: Số 130 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Tom Hue Tours
Description:
After a four week tour of SE Asia, in the company of six different local guides, I can confidently say that Tuan was easily the best!

He made every place that we visited (Da Nang, Hội An, Huế and points in between) really interesting and fun, was easy to understand, had great local knowledge and had a terrific sense of humor. I really recommend him.
Rank_of_province: Số 35 trên 84 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Huế

Title: Anna Food Tour
Description: To describe my experience with Anna Food tour in one word: AMAZING. I love the energy Anna have and even though she's young (my age) she knows so much about food. Whenever we passed a special building she knew all the history behind it. I'm super impressed. Thanks a bunch!
Rank_of_province: Số 59 trên 296 Giải trí về đêm ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Yen's Tour
Description:
Fantastic tour. Yen greeted me in HCMC, from where we made our way to the Mekong Delta by minivan with bicycles in the back. Over the next three days, Yen took me on some amazing bike rides through areas that were so interesting and diverse. We took ferries on several occasions and jumped back in the van once or twice. The tour covered area around Vinh Long, Can Tho and Cai Be.
We stopped at several places of interest over the three days, took in a great boat trip and the floating market near Can Tho. Yen organised a wonderful trip for me. Included breakfasts and lunches were wonderful and the accommodation each night was of very high quality.
Yen was fantastic. Her knowledge of the area was first class and she had everything so well organised .. from accommodation to the boat that met us in the middle of nowhere to take us on a great trip down the river to where we could continue cycling from ... Thank you Yen, for a very memorable tour. I highly recommend her, fantastic guide (I would have got totally lost trying to do this on my own!) along with being very friendly and personable. Thank You.
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 2 Chuyến tham quan & hoạt động ở Long Xuyên

Description: My traveling companion and I signed up through Traveling Spoon for a dinner at the home of Tam Do in Ho Chi Minh City, and had a marvelous time with her and her charming daughter Kim in their apartment. Tam's food was excellent, and she explained its preparation and context for us as she served. Tam runs her own catering business, with a special focus on organic food and environmentally sensitive packaging -- we had a fascinating conversation with her about her experiences.

Title: Dark Cave Phong Nha Tours
Description: A friend and I came to the cave and spent a hilarious couple of hours getting involved in the sporty and active adventure within the cave. We missed the safety video which in hindsight would have been helpful as we did not know how to successfully stop ourselves as the bottom of the zipline (we both graciously crashed into the mat). We had a lot of fun with our tour guide who helped us get equipped with helmets and torches before we acclimatised to the cold water, swam 10-40m to the cave entrance and hiked in through a muddy pathway. The guide called out when we needed to slow down to get safely through the tunnel. We arrived at a mud bath which was very slippery but the whole group loved getting fully involved in the mud and we had a great laugh all together. If you do not want to get muddy, this trip is NOT for you. Then we went back out for a cold dip and to remove the mud from our bodies and clothing, before kayaking (which was a lot of effort after we had laughed so much) back to the adventure course. This part is optional but we stayed and did a mini zip line, a big dive into the water and a small assault course over the water. A very fun afternoon and well worth the price if you are with a good group of adventurous people!
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 2 Giải trí về đêm ở Son Trach

Title: Lang Thang

Title: TeaTour Travel
Description:
It was such a splendid tea tour and precious experience for me and my friend. Our gorgeous tour guide Angel and the red lotus tour agency arranged a perfect itinerary for us during our 2-day tour.
They took us to La Bang commune the first day where we enjoyed picking tea leaves with the warmhearted local people and had a look at their household tea workshop. It was excited for us to take part in the tea making process. Then we had a delicious lunch in local household. They served us with a kind of expensive fish which looks like a shark. It tasted quite different from the normal fish. I felt like it's more chewy. Our tour guide Angel is very informative with tea knowledge and I got a lot of useful information about tea planting, tea processing and tea drinking from her.
On the early morning of the second day, we went to the tea market of the La Bang Commune in which we bumped into the woman who hosted us to her tea making household workshop yesterday. She also came to sell her tea. The tea market was filled with local tea makers and tea wholesalers from different places in Vietnam. They were all busy with judging the tea quality and bargaining the tea price. So we didn't stay long there and then we headed to Tan Cuong Commune which is also famous for tea plantation and the Nui Coc lake. The view of lake and boat ride were all nice, but the most impressive experience for us was that we visited a local tea processing leader's house. Over there we saw the ancient tea trees. some of them are even taller than 2 meters. The host also taught us another traditional way to fry the tea leaves. It was very interesting that we could have the firsthand experience. Most importantly, the host's wife is an excellent cook because she cooked some dishes with tea leaves which were creative and fresh. For us, we prefer to the fried matcha toufu and steamed fish filled with fresh tea leaves.
The tea cultural space is also a destination you should not miss because you can learn some history of planting and processing tea in Thai Nguyen and also appreciate the delicate ancient tea wares.
In short, I truly would like to recommend this tea tour for you if you are tea lovers or you are interested in tea and tea culture. The tea culture tour is a combination of sightseeing, knowledge learning and food tasting. The tea tour guides are all very funny, friendly and patient. If you take part in this tour, you will not be disappointed.
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 2 Chuyến tham quan & hoạt động ở Thái Nguyên

Title: Our Hoi An Memories
Address: 59/14 Đường 18-8, Hội An 560000 Việt Nam
Description:
We really enjoyed this experience with the tour around some of the old town and the central markets first. A nice insight into local life.

The foot massage was a nice touch after the huddle and bustle of the market, and our 5 yr old enjoyed it immensely!!

The cooking class was the highlight, with an amazing, bubbly and experienced chef. She made our class really fun and enjoyable! Amazing recipes that were delicious to eat afterwards!

Thanks for a great time!!
Rank_of_province: Số 87 trên 167 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hội An

Title: Villa Hue Cooking Class
Address: 2 Vo Thi sau st, Huế 5300 Việt Nam
Description:
During our stays at the hotel we took a cooking class which was conducted in the hotel restaurant kitchen. The class covered 3 traditional Hue dishes in about 2.5 hrs with plenty of hands-on. While each standard classes offered 3 pre-determined dishes we discussed with the restaurant manager to mix and match the dishes that we were keen to learn.

The Chef/instructor was very professional and happy to demonstrate and share her culinary skills, though she speaks only Vietnamese but it was never a problem with one other staff acting as interpreter for us. There were just 2 of us as a couple in the class so we received full attention and free to ask questions and practice throughout the session. We thoroughly enjoyed the cooking class and the food that we helped cooking during the class.

Though the recipe was emailed to us at the end of the course it was quite brief. hence it is highly recommended that particpants take note of the steps if you want to replicate the dishes, which we did when we return home!
Rank_of_province: Số 12 trên 35 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Huế

Title: Hoho Travel
Description:
Our guide seemed nice but didn't speak English, so he wasn't able to tell us anything about the places we were at. He took us to a marble factory, which was interesting, but he just dropped us off. He then took us on to Hoi An, which we were looking forward to. When we asked if he could recommend a restaurant, he dropped us off in front of one and just pointed. We would have liked to try the Anthony Bourdain restaurant, but forgot it was an option to ask for and did not have it offered to us.

In the end, we feel like we ended up paying $100s of dollars for a taxi ride to Hoi An and back.
Rank_of_province: Số 26 trên 98 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Đà Nẵng

Title: Exotic Travel Vietnam
Description: Just arrived back in the US after a tour of Vietnam arranged by Exotic vacations. This was one of the best vacations we’ve had. We were able to talk w experience daily life of normal people of Vietnam . Another part of the trip was a tour of ha long bay via 3 day cruise. I was able to visit my fathers airbase from his tour of Vietnam 50 years ago as well.. exotic vacations worked w me to design an affordable package to fit what I wanted to see. I have nothing but good to say of each and every member of their staff
Rank_of_province: Số 37 trên 84 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Huế

Title: Travel with Leon
Description: Mình sống ở Cần Thơ. Đợt vừa rồi có cơ hội ra ngoài Hà Nội chơi và may mắn được Leon dẫn đi tham quan và trải nghiệm khắp thủ đô. Nhờ 1 người bạn giới thiệu nên mình đã biết và lựa chọn Travelwithleon, mình nghĩ đó là lựa chọn vô cùng chính xác. Chuyến đi thành công vượt ra khỏi mong đợi của mình, bởi trước đó mình không có ý định thuê hướng dẫn viên hay tour mà tự đi là chính. Phải nói rằng được đồng hành cùng Leon quả là 1 trải nghiệm thú vị, chuyến đi mang lại cho mình nhiều kiến thức và hiểu rõ hơn về phong tục, truyền thống Thăng Long nghìn năm văn hiến. Đặc biệt, mình được tiếp xúc và trò chuyện với người dân nơi đây, được các cụ kể về những câu chuyện thời chiến vô cùng oanh liệt và oai hùng. Travelwithleon đã cho mình những trải nghiệm thực tế nhất, gần gũi và giản dị nhất, đúng chất của người Hà Nội. Cảm ơn TravelwithLeon rất nhiều và hẹn Leon vào 1 ngày không xa ❤️

Title: Aodaigo - Day Tours
Description:
My family and I went on a tour with the ladies into the surrounding countryside where we visited a lagoon, went to a home in the mangroves where a couple had resided for over 30 years, a boat ride through the lagoon and then lunch at a local Vietnamese house.

The ladies were all really lovely and spoke perfect English. Having never been on a scooter I was a bit nervous however the ladies all drove really safely and I felt completely confident in them.

The boat ride was so much fun and a really nice added bonus.

The food we had for lunch is some of the best we have had in Vietnam so far and we had a wide range of dishes including prawns in passion fruit sauce, beef skewers, banana flower and duck salad and lots more.

Everyone in my family said this was their favourite activity in Vietnam so far! I wish I could do it again!

Title: Tour Center Viet Nam
Description: We had to catch a taxi, cost 20,000 Dong, from our Royal MGallery hotel to one of the big van stops about 2 km away. While comfortable, I noticed the van was beginning to age. Please note the 24 seater van could not go through Hoi An Old Town in the evening, so be prepared to walk or catch a taxi to your hotel. The tour guide was very friendly, tried very hard to please with his local and historical knowledge but I could hardly understand some of them, could be due to sitting further back. All places we stopped at were interesting and worthwhile visiting. The total duration was just right.
Rank_of_province: Số 32 trên 107 Phương tiện giao thông ở Huế

Title: Culture Pham Travel & Transport
Description: Great transfer from Hoi An to golden bridge 1 day. We booked the private SUV from Allegro Resort Hoi An to Bana Hills and got great service. The driver was punctual and the car was very clean and comfortable. Our driver helped us to buy cable car tickets and offered us complimentary bottled water. Time was very flexible and was more than enough for us to explore Bana Hills attractions for 1 day. I 100% recommend this service.
Rank_of_province: Số 63 trên 127 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hội An

Title: Kilo Distillery & Bar
Address: Hem 89, Thái Thông, Nha Trang 650000 Việt Nam
Description: Recommended by a friend who lives in Nha Trang and we're so glad he did. Easy to get there by booking a taxi via the Grab app. The journey through the rural scenery is part of its appeal. The owner is friendly and laid back and made us feel like regulars within minutes. The bar is built around a traditional Vietnamese distillery where Kilo makes his own Rum from molasses and Brandy from fermented fruit. I can highly recommend all of them but beware. It's strong stuff. Musicians seem to be particularly welcome but if you just want to sit and enjoy the music you'll be just as welcome too. The pizza's were epic. The atmosphere is lovely. Make the effort to go here. You'll be as glad we were if you do!
Rank_of_province: Số 11 trên 36 Giải trí về đêm ở Nha Trang

Title: Private Shore Excursions from CHAN MAY Port or TIEN SA DA NANG Port
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 1 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Tho Quang

Title: Best Price Tour Co.ltd
Description:
We booked day tour through Best Price Co and the service we received could not have been better. The tour guide were knowledgeable, speaking good English and knows a lot about Hanoi. A fun way to see the city of you don’t mind navigating the traffic.Thanks for the amazing experience.
We will definitely book again and will recommend to all our friends.
Rank_of_province: Số 162 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Hoa's Family
Description: 호이안 쿠킹 클레스를 찾던 중 알게되어 예약하고 찾아간 호아스 페밀리. 전체 진행이 영어로 진행된다는 점이 부담 스러울 수는 있겠지만 어렵지 않은 영어라 충분히 따라갈만 합니다. 아침재래시장, 바구니배, 다리마사지,쿠킹클래스까지 모두 만족스러웠고 픽업, 드롭 서비스까지 포함되 마음편하게 일정을 보낼 수 있었어요. 아이들 만족도도 매우 높았던 액티비티.강추 합니다.
Rank_of_province: Số 64 trên 127 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hội An

Title: Sim Sơn Phú Quốc
Description: Một người quen trong gia đình giới thiệu cho tôi địa điểm này. Là một nơi rất tuyệt vời dành cho gia đình và bạn bè khi du lịch Phú Quốc. Vườn lan và vườn sim rất đẹp mà quy mô, có rất nhiều loại lan quý mà lần đầu tiên tôi được nhìn thấy. Các sản phẩm làm từ sim ở đây cũng rất ngon và lôi cuốn. Tôi đặc biệt thích siro sim và rượu sim.
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 1 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Dương Tơ

Title: Noi Rang Cooking Class
Address: 999 Trần Nhân Tông Cẩm Thanh, Hội An 560000 Việt Nam
Description: Our friend Tu took us to the Hoi An Co Co Resort to learn the tricks of Vietnamese cooking. I particularly enjoyed making the Vietnamese pancakes and the sweet and sour dipping sauce. We also cooked bass fillets in banana leaves and made a green papaya and carrot salad with pork. We ate the pancakes wrapped in rice paper rolls and dipped in the sauce. Delicious. Tu was a really lovely guide who enjoyed helping us. Awesome experience.
Rank_of_province: Số 91 trên 167 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hội An

Title: Thanhy's Home Cooking
Address: 21 Lane 472/11 Lac Long Quan Street Nhat Tan ward, Tay Ho district, Hà Nội 10000 Việt Nam
Description: Bananenblütensalat, Wilder Pfeffer aus den Bergen, Feinste Kombination von Zutaten, spannende Gäste, ein familiärer Abend den ich nicht vergessen werde.
Rank_of_province: Số 85 trên 224 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hà Nội

Title: ĐI ĐI TRAVEL
Description: Had a wonderful tour with Hang. We visited the citadel and several tombs. Our guide was very knowledgeable and friendly. We really enjoyed our time and would recommend this tour.

Description: Wir hatten eine schöne Streetfood-Tour durch Hanoi mit unserem Guide Tuan, der sehr nett, professionell und sachkundig war. Vielen Dank und sehr zu empfehlen!

Sehr gute vegetarische Optionen und Rezepte, die man gut zuhause nachmachen kann.

Title: Vespa Tours
Description: Parcourir la ville de Saigon derrière sur un scooter (plus prudent) est très agréable et est moins dangereux que l'on pense. 5 arrêts : un café, deux resto, un concert acoustique et une boîte de nuit. Guide Mai Le très agréable. Tout est un peu trop chronométré.
Rank_of_province: Số 141 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
