Description:
Vacation to experience the history and culture of Vietnam, Laos and Cambodia.
Had been there for business, but wanted a private and personal ecperience.
Rank_of_province: Số 87 trên 224 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hà Nội

Title: Nguyen Eco Tours
Description: Kim was an amazing tour guide! She is so friendly and fun, and her English is great. We took her food tour, where she took us to eat great local food in Can Tho. We also did her floating market tour which also went through the tranquil Mekong delta. Highly recommend!
Rank_of_province: Số 5 trên 16 Phương tiện giao thông ở Cần Thơ

Title: Da Viet Art And Gemstone Center
Rank_of_province: Số 2 trên 8 Giải trí về đêm ở Ninh Bình

Title: Thanh Dong Cooking Class
Description:
We visited this as part of a bike tour around the shrimp farms and rice fields, a trip around the local market and finally a quick go down the river in a baker boat. This was all super informative and fascinating as well as very picturesque and relaxing.

We then went on to the eco farm which is one of the first in the area to avoid any form of chemicals or pesticides in their very beautiful organic farm. We were shown around by Hamy who was translating for one of the farmers, both lovely people. The farm is a lovely experience where we also picked a few of our ingredients for the cooking class.

The cooking class was led by the wife of the farmer and her son, they were brilliant at explaining the ingredients and as it was only a small group (which they aim to maintain) it was very personal and unrushed. We prepared, marinated and cooked several dishes and then went to eat in a lovely setting between the farm allotments where we enjoyed the food we had prepared and the conversation with the locals and our other tour guests.

Such a fabulous and memorable place and I highly recommend visiting.
Rank_of_province: Số 95 trên 167 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hội An

Title: Let's eat LIKE a local
Rank_of_province: Số 28 trên 98 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Đà Nẵng

Title: TripGuru Da Nang
Description: Nice half day tour - Marble Mountain was really cool, full of history and the tour guide was super knowledgeable.
Rank_of_province: Số 29 trên 98 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Đà Nẵng

Title: Vietnam Retro Tour
Description:
Our guides were Eric and Henry. They were very attentive, courteous, knowledgable and good fun. They take you round to all the sites in Hanoi, some less well known ones amongst them. We also visited a cafe to have an "egg coffee" this apparently is something they developed due to a shortage of milk in the Vietnam war. It tastes surprisingly very nice.
We were a bit apprehensive when we booked it due to the traffic in Hanoi and us only having a motorbike and sidecar to protect us. But we felt safe the whole time. Its an exhillerating way to see the sites either riding pillion or in the sidecar.
The whole way round Eric was taking photos which he later sends to you on Whatsapp.
So we thoroughly recommend this trip. If you only do one site seeing trip in Hanoi you wont go wrong with this one.
Rank_of_province: Số 62 trên 207 Giải trí về đêm ở Hà Nội

Title: Workshop by Triip
Address: Vo Thi Sau street, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 70000 Việt Nam
Description: Lần đầu tiên tham dự workshop làm gỗ thực sự rất bở ngỡ vì không gian tổ chức rất thơ mộng ( cứ như trong film vậy :)) ) thêm nữa nội dung buổi học rất thú vị vì nó ko chỉ giới hạn ở việc làm theo mẫu sản phẩm mà còn được tự mình thiết kế ra mẫu mã mà mình muốn làm dưới sự hướng dẫn của giáo viên. Nói chung với 260k mà được trải nghiệm 1 buổi học nt thật sự rất đáng giá!
Rank_of_province: Số 40 trên 158 Vui chơi & Giải trí ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Tâm Travel
Description:
Herzlichen Dank an das sehr sehr gute Team von Tam Travel!

Wir haben eine Rundreise gebucht Hanoi - Halong Bucht - Hoi An - Hue - Ho Chi Minh Stadt - Menkong Delta und haben eine der schönsten Reisen erleben dürfen. Die Organisation von Tam Travel war vor der Reise sehr detailliert und auch während der Reise konnten wir das Team jederzeit um Rat ansprechen. Es war eine perfekte Mischung aus Kultur, Sehenswürdigkeiten, Kulinarisch war es der Hammer, Erholung und Einführung in das Land. Selbst für unseren Sohn (12 Jahre) war es eine Bereicherung und eine Horizonterweiterung! Die Reiseführer waren deutschsprachig und haben uns, durch ihr Fachwissen, das Land Vietnam näher gebracht und dazu beigetragen, dieses tolle und aufregende Land in naher Zukunft wieder zu besuchen!
Wir können Tam Travel sehr empfehlen. Es ist ein tolles Land mit herzlichen Menschen und das Essen ist genial! Wir freuen uns heute schon auf die nächste Reise (-:
Rank_of_province: Số 88 trên 224 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hà Nội

Aquarium is also nice. Winwonders is great entertainment, fun for families. Tour guide is friendly! Accommodation booked for 5 * but given something like <4 *

Title: Destinasia Tour

Title: Bravo Indochina Tours
Description:
The below is a complaint we are lodging against Bravo Indochina. This will also be repeated via other social media platforms including Tripadvisor.

We made our booking with Bravo Indochina (via Tour Radar) two months ago and were initially impressed with their statement of, 'We hope our dedication and commitment can be the best assurance of the quality of service you can expect from Bravo Indochina Tours'. Unfortunately, our experience was far from this, and the problems started immediately.

Problems before departure:

1. Tour dates booked incorrectly with confirmation being sent to us showing the arrangements starting in November 2022 and finishing in September 2022!

2. We had an original print out of the itinerary, and it states Domestic flights were included. We paid in full and later were told that two of the flights were not included. Mysteriously the wording on the itinerary appeared to be dynamically changed and we were forced to pay more, which amounted to USD$229pp more. Bravo denied anything was changed, but our print-out proved otherwise

3. We requested to be picked up from a local hotel on day one in Phnom Penh instead of at the airport. We asked for 12 noon, but the itinerary was sent to us showing 12 midnight. Surely the person typing this would have realised this was an obvious error, but the errors and issues just kept on coming!

4. On the second day of the tour, the itinerary mentioned we were having a 'full day tour' of Phnom Penh starting at 0725, but the airport transfer was booked for 1300. Not sure how they thought this was a 'full day tour' instead of a 'half day' tour?

5. The itinerary stated the Angkor Wat tour started at 0900, but they were calling it a 'Sunset tour' without any suitable explanation given as to what we would be doing for the entire day until the actually sunset at 1730!

6. Another itinerary mistake that just showed no attention to detail for the excursion in Hoi An. It stated the My Son Sanctuary tour started at 2350 and finished at 0450!... Seriously, was anyone reading the itinerary!.. We ended up not doing this anyway.

7. Booking numbers for the flights were not shown on the itinerary, which concerned us. We were told to not worry about that and the airlines would have our details. In the end, we had every right to worry as will be explained further below.

8. We were told the Sunset tour river cruise in Phnom Penh would pick us up around 1500 and then the sunset would be at 1730. We thought the pick-up time was very early but accepted it.... As it turned out in reality, we were not picked-up until 1630.

Tour departure onward:

Day 1: The transfer from our local hotel to our first hotel on the tour (G Mekong) was provided with a non-English speaking driver in a Tuk-Tuk.... The image provided on the itinerary provided by Bravo Indochina showed a comfortable van and stated the driver would be English speaking. We appreciate we were not coming from the airport, but a taxi at least should have been provided. Instead, we had a Tuk Tuk with luggage on our laps roaring through the streets of Phnom Penh. The driver was supposed to arrive at 1200 noon, but instead turned up at 1100am whilst were having a late breakfast and therefore had to be turned away by hotel Management until 1200 noon.

Day 2: We were given the inclusions for the tour of Phnom Penh that was re-scheduled to 0700am, but the driver did not arrive until 0720am. After we rushed breakfast for the supposed 0700 pick-up time and based on the wording of the itinerary were expecting a decent view of the Royal Palace. In reality we were whisked past, and it was almost a blink, and you would miss it moment. We even had to mention to the guide about the visit and he seemed to be surprised that we were wanting to see it. The driver also thought the time stated on the itinerary for the flight departure to Siem Reap of 1300 was too late and was suggesting 1130 instead, but eventually sorted things out with Bravo Indochina with a compromised time.

Upon arrival in Siem Reap, we were offloaded at The Sanctuary Residence Siem Reap hotel. This was certainly not a sanctuary. The bed was so hard, that we had to end up asking to change rooms for the second night and signs inside the lobby mentioning not bringing firearms into the property was a little disconcerting.

Day 3: The bad experience at the hotel continued with an abysmal breakfast. There were three staff standing at the entrance to the restaurant to welcome us, but none of them seemed to want to do any work to replenish the so called 'buffet' with empty juice containers and scraps left in the Bain-maries. The restaurant opening times stated that breakfast was still had an hour to go, but there was virtually nothing left, and I was forced to speak to Management to get the staff to re-fill the breakfast items. The whole situation was so bad that we decided to eat out independently the following morning at a Cafe.

We then flew to Ho Chi Minh city. Upon exiting the Arrivals Hall our driver was nowhere to be seen. We eventually found our driver, but he did not have our names on his sign and for some reason had an 'Intrepid' holidays logo instead of 'Bravo Indochina'.. We ended up being dumped at the 'Blue Diamond Luxury Hotel. This property may look okay in the pictures, but it is certainly not suitable for Western travellers. The decor and restaurant offerings seem more geared to the local Asian market. The only good thing about this hotel was the location.

Day 4: Today was a tour to the Cu Chi Tunnels with lunch. I don't think the guide was reading the itinerary as tour spots were either missed or jumbled around. It is appreciated that you need to be flexible on vacation, but no explanation was given for the changes and it always kept us guessing if points would be missed and as it turned out we did miss the local market and documentary film. Lunch was beyond terrible. We barely ate anything. The Waitress seemed a bit upset, but what do you expect when options are not supplied, and you are just expected to eat foreign food without any explanation in English provided to advise what you are eating. No thought was given for clients coming from a Western country.

Our Vietnam airlines flight from Ho Chi Minh to Da Nang got changed to a later time, which was totally unnecessary and meant we did not get to Hoi An until 2200. Our guide to the Cu Chi tunnels was aware of the change, but Bravo Indochina failed to tell us at the same time. Bravo advised the change was done by the airline, but Vietnam airlines provided us a screenshot of the air booking and it showed the booking was ticketed on 12 Nov for the later flight. If Bravo had actually booked us on the flight shown on the itinerary, it wouldn't have been necessary for the guide to take us to the sheltered workshop with staff making lacquer art in a factory. We had no interest in this at all and I'm sure the guide did not like us not making any purchases and thus missing out on a potential kick-back.

Arriving in Hoi An much later in the day than expected, we were eventually given the room category (river view) that was shown in the itinerary picture and that Bravo Indochina confirmed they would request. This was the view we were really looking forward to, but the hotel initially tried to give us a room at the back of the property, which was not appealing at all. The issue with the room was the last thing we needed after a long day and the hotel made us feel like we were trying to get something for free.

We asked Bravo Indochina what compensation could be provided for these continual issues as they were certainly not volunteering anything before this, and they advised they could provide a dinner for us. We never ended up getting this meal as the company could not find a suitable Western restaurant for us. They only seemed to want to keep constantly steering us towards a Pan-Asian style eatery in Hanoi that they had contracted. We ended up with nil compensation as it all seemed too difficult for them.

Day 5: Another itinerary mistake with the journey from Hoi An to Hue. It stated at 0700 departure, but at the same time, it mentioned 'enjoying a morning at leisure'.... Why was this not being picked up by staff at Bravo Indochina?... An obvious mistake and we had to fight to get our morning at leisure until 1100am.

Upon arrival in Hue, it was obvious there was really only one thing to see in the city for tourists and that is the Citadel. We really could have missed this and would rather have stayed longer in Hoi An or at the next spot in Hanoi. The two-three hour journey to get there was not worth it and Bravo conceded that Hanoi was much more interesting than Hue.

Day 6: The Vietnam airlines flight shown on the itinerary was changed to budget carrier Vietjet. We therefore were expected to get up earlier again unnecessarily because of this change. It was explained the original flight shown on the itinerary was not suitable, but why was it shown if it wasn't?.. Again, lack of attention to detail or an error?... We spoke to Customer Service at Vietnam airlines and they confirmed we were never booked on the flight shown on the itinerary. We should be compensated for this change to a lower class of carrier than what was paid for, which we worked out was half the price of Vietnam airlines. All of this confirmed to us the real reason the flight booking numbers not being supplied was because in our opinion the flights were not booked when the itinerary documents were emailed.

After arriving in Hanoi, we were met by the guide for the city tour in a sedan. He seemed to think we would be driving around for the duration of the tour and knew nothing about the rickshaw component mentioned in the itinerary. He did call his office and got it organised, but it was concerning that he did not know about the rickshaw ride, which ended up being the best part of the tour and we would have been very disappointed if we had of missed out.

The hotel in Hanoi was the Hanoi Nostalgia Hotel & Spa. We were given a room overlooking an inner courtyard but had expected a room at the front of the property. The room attendant told us the rooms at the front were VERY noisy and therefore we stayed with the room provided. When we came back for our second visit after the Halong Bay excursion we were then put into a room at the front, and it turned out the rooms have double doors facing the street and therefore noise was not an issue at all. Unfortunately, the hotel was caught out with this lie.

Day 7: We were really looking forward to the Halong Bay Cruise. Yet again the itinerary was incorrect and stated we would be travelling with a company called Indochina Junk. We had researched that cruise company and were happy with what was going to be offered. As it turned out, we were put onto a company called Cozy Bay Cruises. What a dump of a vessel!!.. It started with an uncomfortable bus taking us to the pier and once we got on the boat, we had a cabin with a bathroom that flooded from a mysterious water source, a shower door that did not seal properly and a bathroom curtain that we could not open and close. Most of the food and fortunately our fellow travellers were the only saving grace.

The guide for the Halong Bay excursion advised us before travelling back to Hanoi that our hotel in Hanoi had been changed. This was supposedly done to upgrade us to a nicer property. We are not sure what the true reason for the change was and were even questioning if our original hotel had been booked, but we actually liked our original hotel in old Hanoi and had booked to go to see the Water Puppets near the hotel.

We were two men travelling on this holiday, but the hotels and drivers seemed to be often confused and were expecting a man and a woman. Even one of our air tickets said Ms instead of Mr, that really could have caused a problem at the airport, but fortunately did not. Again, attention to detail by Bravo Indochina was lacking. WhatsApp messages would come through saying Hi Sell, instead of Hi Mr Sells.

It seemed almost impossible to get straight answers from Bravo Indochina as our difficult questions were either not answered or very minimally answered. This all proved very frustrating and ruined the vacation. We know Bravo Indochina have the right to change the itinerary, but it seemed to be a convenient excuse to cover up mistakes and it always worked to our detriment.

Final documents were also very slow in coming and had to be chased up though Tour Radar.

All in all, this vacation was a total disaster from start to finish and we would like to see an adequate response from Bravo Indochina and Tour Radar with suitable compensation.
Rank_of_province: Số 90 trên 224 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hà Nội

Title: Indochina Charmtours
Description: Hello Indochina Charm Tours staff. Thank you for your follow-up email regarding my family 15-day vacation trip to Viet Nam in February 2018. In regards to my experience with this trip, I must say that Indochina Charm Tours services throughout the trip met our expectations in 3 keys requirements of a vacation trip, which are: Nice/clean hotels, delicious meals on the trip and knowledgeable, friendliness of the tour guides and professionalism of your entire administration staffs. Personally, I'd strongly recommend Indochina Charm Tours to anyone who is planning to take a trip to Vietnam.
Rank_of_province: Số 36 trên 135 Vui chơi & Giải trí ở Hà Nội

Title: Zen Cooking Class
Address: 10/68 Đội Cấn, Ba Đình, Hà Nội 10000 Việt Nam
Description:
Tôi đến với Anna tình cờ khi tìm hiểu ăn chay, thật tuyệt cô ấy đã làm tôi thấy rất thú vị với các món ăn tốt cho sức khoẻ và đúng với gu của mình

Tôi thấy tâm thái thoải mái, suy nghĩ tích cực hơn khi áp dụng một số mẹo nấu chay của cô ấy.

Sẽ gặp lại cô ấy nhiều lần và sớm nhất!

Các bạn nên lựa chọn Anna và những món ăn của cô ấy để trải nghiệm điều tuyệt vời :)
Rank_of_province: Số 91 trên 224 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hà Nội

Title: THANKS TRAVEL - HOI AN
Description:
Notre hôtesse Thanh (an bang garden beach homestay) nous a recommandé notre guide Duc pour visiter Hoi An autrement. Nous avons choisi le circuit 1 à vélo pour visiter les magnifiques paysages de Hoi An qui se composent aussi de verdures, de rizières et de fleuves. Duc est un enfant du pays et grâce a lui, nous avons pu vivre une expérience des plus authentiques auprès des locaux qu'il connaît et aide au quotidien. Il nous a régalé pour le déjeuner avec une cuisine familiale et pleine de saveurs. Un éco-tour comme on les aimes et que l'on veut recommander et partager pour être dépaysé et faire le pleins de souvenirs.

If you want to travel differently and with authenticity at a slow pace, don't hesitate to do the bike tour (tour 1) with Duc. The countryside of Hoi An is beautiful with the rice fields, the rivers and the peaceful local life. We had an amazing time and ate great food thanks to Duc and I highly recommand him as he is a child of Hoi An and is contributing to make the life of the locals a little better ;)
Rank_of_province: Số 65 trên 127 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hội An

Title: Coconut And You
Address: Thôn Thanh Tam Đông, Xã Cẩm Thanh, Hội An 560000 Việt Nam
Description:
단체관광을 따라가면 일정한 코스 똑같은 시간, 가장 혹독한 건 뙤약볕 아래 더위를 피하기 위해 코코넛숲으로 배를 대는데, 시간에 몰린 뱃사공은 빨리빨리 진행해야하므로 고객의 고충을 이해하지 못해요.
이곳에서 코코넛배투어를 하면, 원하는 코스로 데리고 갑니다.
시간도 단체관광이 30분에 그치는 반면, 1시간으로 제법 깁니다.
투어회사에 지불하는 가격이면, 이곳 투어는 훌륭한 점심식사까지 포함할 수 있습니다.
그럼 어떻게 찾아가냐구요? 예약하면 무료 픽업합니다. 다낭에서 온다구요? 호이안 큰 건물 사진만 하나 보내면 바로 찾아와서 픽업해요.

쿠킹클래스도 같이 운영하기 때문에 메뉴도 다양한데, 그냥 기본으로 먹어도 훌륭해요.
뭘 받아먹었길래 이렇게 칭찬하냐구요?
하하, 들켰다. 리뷰 잘써주는 댓가로 맥주 2캔 공짜로 먹었어요.
그래도 투어가 마음에 드니까 써주는거죠.
Rank_of_province: Số 98 trên 167 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hội An

You get a lot for your money worth. Drinks are awesome aswell. Try the fresh mojito’s!! Staff is friendly and polite. Their english is good and the terrace looks cute.

Title: Chef Tan Cooking Class
Description:
We had a great day. It was fun to see around the farm and pick our own veggies, then learn how to prepare all the different dishes, and it all tasted totally delicious.
Alice and her team were very patient, even with one of our extremely fussy teens who decided he would only eat tofu, cucumber and noodles!
Finally the visit to CuChi tunnels was really interesting and our teenage boys enjoyed the challenge of crouching through the tiny tunnels and also a try at the shooting range.
Perfect tour for a family of vegetarians while in HoChiMinhCity.
Rank_of_province: Số 49 trên 147 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Gotta Go Indochina
Description:
Recently completed a two week family trip to Vietnam fully arranged through Ms. Nga Nguyen at Gotta Go Indochina on advice from a a friend. We are very happy we took their advice. Ms Nga Nguyen provided exceptional advise, options and suggestions, including great value for money. I really recommend contacting Ms Nga Nguyen for all your travel needs in Vietnam. Our trip ran exceptionally smooth with all transfers on time, safe and pleasant. Tours were great fun and accommodation provided was perfect. Throughout the trip Ms Nga kept in contact with us to make sure everything was running smoothly - which it did.
If you are traveling to Vietnam from Australia and want the best price and service I would highly recommend to give Gotta Go Indochina and ask for Ms Nga Nguyen - you will be glad you did.
Rank_of_province: Số 18 trên 39 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Huế

Title: HAPPY PLUS TRAVEL
Description:
I had a wonderful time visiting the Cu Chi Tunnels and the Mekong Delta with the help of David, who was an excellent planner and organizer. He understood my requirements well and was always available for any kind of query resolution. He arranged the best tour guide one can ask for, Mr Bui, who had deep knowledge on our tours and Saigon culture and always kept the group intact with beautiful stories and history.

I was scared of being asked for tips at random places as I had read about it (especially in Mekong Delta). When I let David know the same, he made sure that we were comfortable everywhere by letting the tour guide know in advance who would then always come up if he saw someone persuading for tips. So we had nothing to worry about on this perspective and this reassurance of not worrying about anything made our trip really mesmerizing.

Our requests for vegetarian food and small group (< 10 pax) were also considered, so the tour guide could focus on us and it was not crowded. Our limousine bus was extremely comfortable, very silent so we got a good amount of time to relax in between and yes not to forget cold water bottle was provided 500 ml each and pickup & drop was exactly from the hotel point. Excellent Hospitality & the pickup and drop services were well informed in advance.

Unlike many tours that are about money, here the focus is solely on hospitality and rich experience. We were given options to pay for the trip whenever we felt the most comfortable with - be it cash or online payment (with no platform charges for international travellers, so we paid exactly what was asked). Along with the bigger things, all the other little things, like proper wait time for restrooms and time for breakfast, were adequately provided for each one of us.

David made our day in HCMC really brighter and I would 101% recommend him to anyone for any kind of trip planning. He is the best planner you can find in HCMC!
Rank_of_province: Số 66 trên 273 Phương tiện giao thông ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Hanoi Backstreet Tours - Hoi An Backroad Tours
Description: Nick and mei took us on a brilliant tour , their service and attention to detail and local knowledge was fantastic ! Always accomodating and open to questions - a super experience was the local floating restaurant at the end of the tour ! Would very much recommend them and this tour - thanks again Nick and Mei! All the best for the future
Rank_of_province: Số 2 trên 4 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở An Hoi

Title: Danang Local Tour
Description:
這次同老婆及她的2個朋友第一次去越南,聽朋友介紹曾經幫襯過這間公司,於是今次便試一試,
客戶服務部很好,可以用中文查詢,又比咗好多建議我地
第一天早上8:15 飛機LANDING,包車去咗BIG C SHOPPING , 參觀粉紅教堂 , 然後車到酒店放低行李 ,稍休後 參加了峴港美食之旅
第二天 一早由峴港出發去順化,經海雲嶺風景好美麗,再到順化後,入皇宮,皇陵參觀,導遊英文幾唔錯,講咗好多越南近幾百年歷史
第三天, 去了溫泉樂園,有水上遊樂設施,面積幾大,園內有電動車坐去不同區域,晚上到了會安古頡,同埋一個主題樂園 ,園內有飲有食,環境乾淨少人,同老婆好似有返初約會既感覺.
第四天:上午包車去HAN MARKET買札肉/腰果咖啡,蝦乾,第做手估後,下午我地就返返香港了
再次感謝李少姐為我地安排一個精彩假期
Rank_of_province: Số 31 trên 98 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Đà Nẵng

Title: Hue Taste Food Tour
Description: My wife and I had such a great time exploring Hue with our guide Lu. Not only did he take us to excellent local places that you would never find on your own, but he also helped to explain a lot more about the ingredients and how it was made. He was also very considerate and made sure that we were properly taken care of and that the utensils etc were clean. Lu was a great guide, and even better company. We really enjoyed spending time getting to know him. In short, we HIGHLY recommend this tour!
Rank_of_province: Số 45 trên 84 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Huế

Title: Halong City Tour
Description: Our 2 little boy ( 4 & 5 years old) really enjoyed this tour. Especially the museum and the top view from Sunworld complex. Traveling around was very smooth with friendly and attentive tour guide. Definitely a new choice to explore Halong city
Rank_of_province: Số 8 trên 28 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Vịnh Hạ Long

Title: Mountain View Hostel®
Description:
The most amazing staff in all of veitnam, Tom invited us to dinner our first night with him and his friends for a home cooked local meal, booked a d organised an unforgettable caving experience and gave us a list of activities to do in out next stop Hoi An.
10/10 rooms are very very nice and well priced
I recommend anyone to stay here.
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 2 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Phong Nha

Title: Hanoi Car For Rents
Description: Great trip in Mai Chau with comfortable car and driver helpful. Booking very easy with payment online option.
Rank_of_province: Số 179 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Withlocals
Description:
I signed up for a half day tour on Nov 23, 2016. I used the With Locals website to book my tour and Thanh Le was very accommodating to my schedule. The tour was 5 hours long and led by a wonderful guide, Hien. She was so interesting and knowledgeable, not only about the local area but we learned a lot about Vietnamese history, politics and economics as well. It was a beautiful tour, through back roads, rice paddies and the jungle. We saw rice paper being produced and even got to try making it ourselves, the vegetable growing area, a really huge and interesting cemetery, and lots more, and even had a nice break for iced Vietnamese coffee. I highly recommend this tour company to anyone interested in doing something off the beaten path in Hoi An
(Note - I did this tour in 2016 when there was no Corona virus so the Covid-related questions below were not relevant)
Rank_of_province: Số 121 trên 206 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hội An

Title: 69 the Gallery - Wine & Lounge Bar

Description: Một bar đáng đến khi nhắc tới night club. Không gian tinh tế và nhạc cũng rất ổn. Phục vụ rất chu đáo
Rank_of_province: Số 73 trên 207 Giải trí về đêm ở Hà Nội

Title: Vietnam LGBT Tours
Description:
The most amazing experience, going into the deep unseen parts of Saigon which I would never have been able to see otherwise.

Binh, my scooter driver was super friendly and an amazing driver, navigating through the chaos of Saigon traffic.

Importantly, the street food was amazing, the Banh Trang Nuong (Vn style pizza) is a MUST and was easily my favourite dish!

We ended at a LGBT lounge where the atmosphere was great and cocktails very reasonable priced.

This tour is unlike any other and should be on everyone's bucket list when visiting Saigon and especially great for meeting new friends from all over the world!
Rank_of_province: Số 105 trên 296 Giải trí về đêm ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Description: Kolejny raz korzystaliśmy z usług tego biura. Pełen profesjonalizm i duże zaangażowanie. Wszystko sprawnie i perfekcyjnie, a plan taki, że nie zobaczylibyśmy tego bez nich. Oni tam są i wiedzą co najlepsze. Jeśli Azja to tylko z nimi!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!’
Rank_of_province: Số 150 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Paloma Motorbike Hanoi Tours
Description:
Myself and my husband did this tour on the recommendation of a friend. I was a little apprehensive about it having seen the the chaotic traffic. Tracy and Hannah were our guides for the evening. They picked us up promptly and when Tracey sensed my apprehension she reassured me immediately. Both Tracey and Hannah were charming informative, kind,funny, young people who treated myself and husband with the greatest of respect. They were both excellent safe drivers and gave us both one of the best nights of our trip to Hanoi.
I wish them both every happiness for their futures.
Maria
From Dublin ireland
Jan 2020
Rank_of_province: Số 255 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: ForeverVacation
Description:
We are foodies and love travelling to experience the local food. We also enjoying sinking into the local culture.

This tour provides the both of best worlds. Our guide took us around patiently. We didn't need to worry about going through the crazy traffic to little gems and stalls serving local street food. The variety was truly diverse, from Pho, Banh Xeo down to coconut coffee or foot massage. We enjoyed every single one.

The food overall was very enjoyable, clean and refreshing, as they curated by the tour. There were some outstanding dishes which we would definitely try to visit at some point.

All in all definitely not one to miss during your time here. Thank you!
Rank_of_province: Số 151 trên 326 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Chop and Cut Cooking Class
Address: 113 Bùi Viện Tầng thượng Sahara Beer Club, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 700000 Việt Nam
Description:
I have done some cooking classes in Asia already but that's probably the best one I will ever have!!!! it was just perfect.

place
the place is an roof terasse with loads of green (learn how ginger grows or telling the different spices from their leaves) and a nice cooling system that sprays cool mist on you instead of finishing you off with an ice cold aircon. the view down on the streat is also beautiful and the athmosphere very realxed. there are tables preapared for you to eat your finished food and as much self made green tea ice tea as you can drink.

class
everything is clean an well preapared, there is even staff only to clean your personal amd spaciouse cooking place while you eat what you just prepared. the chef is very skilled and patient showing you tricks (how to hold the knife in a right way to cut chili flowers etc) and the girl that translates the instructions is cheerful and eager to answer all questions you have. the atmosphere is warmhearted and welcoming while beeing very professional.

the food is heavenly delicious. if you are afraid you won't find the ingredients at home they can tell you what's best to use instead.

market
we also booked the market tour which was absolutely worth it because she showed us around explained a lot and not only dragging you around like I experienced with other cooking classes. she even showed us how to choose and catch the best shrimps out of a little pool (the tend to try to get away so hold on thight;) we could also ask her things about food and ingredients we where not going to use in the class so it was very informative and usefull also for the rest of our Vietnam stay !

in short: if you want to learn cooking in an relaxed and beautiful environment from a skilled chef you found the right place
Rank_of_province: Số 51 trên 147 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Saigon Scooter Tours
Description: Fab food tour felt very safe with the drivers great English good insight into young Vietnamese life . Very exciting way to see HCM city

Title: Sữa Cafe
Description: My friend and I had the chance to experience the cooking class and coffee tasting at Sua Cafe. We had the best time from start to finish. Thái and Trang were the best hosts! We thouroughly enjoyed our time here and would definitely recommend to everyone. We also were so impressed by how they run their business. How they love people and provide employment to people who may struggle getting work elsewhere. The food, even though they helped us make it was so delicious and great coffee too. Would love to come back here!!
Rank_of_province: Số 100 trên 167 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hội An

Title: Hoi An Cooking Class
Description: Very very good! It's a fantastic program. I recommend it. 정말 재밌고 친절하시고 음식도 맛있었습니다. 강력추천합니다. 7세아이도 아주 재밌게 참여했어요
Rank_of_province: Số 2 trên 2 Lớp học & hội thảo ở An Hoi

Title: AFS Travel
Description:
AFS, Ms Lily and Ms Orchid has been so kind and very helping during our tour in Vietnam...

Right from beginning since I book the tour and till it end, she was always there to help and guide us...

Their rate was also very good and I suggest to book with them and enjoy travel in Vietnam without any hassle.

We were so impressed that we personally met them and had a good short time spent with them..

Once again AFS Travel, thank you so much for giving us a memorable trip...
Rank_of_province: Số 40 trên 135 Vui chơi & Giải trí ở Hà Nội

Title: DUYEN LE THI THAO
Description: What can I say except that she made ho chi Minh city feel alive in a way I couldn't have ever imagined. She really made every location an adventure. This tour was super fan and all of the spots she picked lead themselves to fun adventures where I could try the local cuisine. The rides in-between the restaurants and locals were also very safe and she is a great driver. She also did a great job explaining the food and the importance it has in he culture and never made me feel bad about my chopstick skills haha. Her English was also at a level that I felt I never had to explain my self too many times. She also was very good at anticipating my needs. I will definitely use her services again! I would also recommend anyone who is traveling solo to look at this tour as a great opportunity to explore one of Vietnam's biggest city ho chi Minh city.
Rank_of_province: Số 45 trên 158 Vui chơi & Giải trí ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Hoian & Vicinity Tours
Description:
Cinq étoiles pour un service parfait!
Au Vietnam, les circuits en français ne sont pas aussi populaires que les circuits en anglais, mais au final nous avons trouvé une agence de voyage comme Hoian & Vicinity Tours. Ils servent les touristes en anglais et en français.
Au début, j'étais un peu sceptique quant à la capacité du guide à parler français, mais après d'avoir discuté un moment, j'ai été très surpris. Il parlait parfaitement le français comme un natif lorsqu'il nous a fourni des informations sur les destinations de notre itinéraire touristique dans la vieille ville de Hoi An. Nous avons appris beaucoup de choses intéressantes de lui. Il était très enthousiaste et n'hésitait pas à nous aider en cas de besoin.
La visite de trois jours et deux nuits à Hoi An et ses environs nous a offert une expérience formidable!
Nous sommes très reconnaissants à Hoian & Vicinity Tours d'avoir organisé une merveilleuse visite pour nous!
Si nous avons l'occasion de retourner à Hoi An, nous les verrons encore certainement. Nous aimons le beau pays du Vietnam!
Rank_of_province: Số 68 trên 127 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hội An

Title: Hội An Nipa Tour
Description: một trãi nghiệm tuyệt vời .chúng tôi di chuyển bằng thuyền thúng.trải nghiêm cảm giác lênh đênh trên sông.very good

Description: So pretty at night. Tons of lanterns lighting up the market. A huge variety of food, souvenirs and plenty of photo opportunities

Title: Dennis HFK
Description: I wasn't sure about this tour when I first booked, but I was not one bit disappointed! Dennis is so fun and friendly and I thoroughly enjoyed my high five class! I can honestly say I am a pro at high fives now and have only Dennis to thank for it. Will definitely be back for his advanced class. Thanks a mil Dennis!!
Rank_of_province: Số 41 trên 135 Vui chơi & Giải trí ở Hà Nội

Title: Can Tho Mekong Tour
Description:
I’m here with a 13 and 15 year old while their father stayed in Melbourne to work. I felt terribly sorry for him as we said goodbye at the airport however that was a week ago and it turns out I drew the short straw!!!

However, our tour guide Jackie remained super positive throughout our tour, was so kind and informative and was not thrown by their truculent behaviour. The noodle factory was actually really fascinating but I suspect these traditional manufacturers are few and far between these days. We also went to a cacao farm and factory which was really interesting and Jackie was very well informed regarding the entire process.

Take Jackie! Leave the teenagers at home
Rank_of_province: Số 11 trên 22 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Cần Thơ

Title: Kumquat Hoi An
Description: We did the morning cycling tour followed by the cooking class. All 4 of us really enjoyed being amongst the nature and peace through the rice fields and the villages. A lovely 20kn ride with a boat trip back then great fun all together learning 6 different dishes to make. Id recommend this to my friends and family.
Rank_of_province: Số 103 trên 167 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hội An

Title: La Holista

Description: A friend and I did a trek with La Holista to Dinh Mountain. It was a great experience! They provided us with a delicious lunch and protein ball snacks. Rob and Chiara were great hosts and guided.

Title: Tsubame Cooking Class
Address: Go Vap District, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 70000 Việt Nam
Description:
もう何度もお世話になっています。
化学調味料やゴテゴテした味付けが嫌いなYen先生のお料理は、特別にハイレベルな行程もないのにどれもこれも美味しい物ばかりです。
日本語も大変上手です。教わった物を帰宅して作ってみようと思ったら、ちょっと分からないところがあった…などもメールで丁寧に対応してくださいます。ほとんど下ごしらえをして頂いている状態で分かりやすい説明を受けながら行程を見るというスタイルなので、凝っていそうな料理でも長丁場になることはありません。
Rank_of_province: Số 57 trên 147 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Mekong Tours

Title: Cooking Class at Lantana Boutique Hotel
Address: 09 Thoại Ngọc Hầu, Hội An 560000 Việt Nam
Description:
It was really great from the time we saw here in the holel. She waz verry friendly in the market. Later her father in low, took us to a nice fishing cruse in the river. Comming to her home, cooking with her and the whole family was really great fun and verry tasty. Dont miss a day with hon.
Michal
Rank_of_province: Số 104 trên 167 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hội An

Title: Asiart Travels
Description: Nous avions choisi Asiart Travels sur internet et alors que nous appréhendions de faire confiance sans vraiment connaître, nous avons au final été totalement conquis par cette agence. C’est incroyable tout ce que nous avons fait grâce à eux. Nous avions décidé d’explorer le Vietnam du nord au sud puis de passer par le Cambodge. Asiart Travels connaît chaque endroit, les coins moins touristiques, isolés de la foule ayant gardé toute leur authenticité et leur charme. Ils savent s’adapter à vos désir. Mlle Le qui a arrangé tout l’itinéraire était très gentille et dynamique. Elle a pris soin de tout pendant le séjour et on a même eu droit à un cadeau sur la fin. J’en profite pour remercier mr Thang d’Hanoi qui nous a fait un super visite de sa ville. C’est toutes ces choses, cette prise en charge, ces visites, ces découvertes d’endroits insolites, qui font d’un simple séjour un voyage extraordinaire. Merci à toute votre équipe et à la très belle Ha. À bientôt.
Rank_of_province: Số 258 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Backstreet Academy Hue
Address: 159 Lê Duẩn, Huế 530000 Việt Nam
Description: We booked a cooking class with BA and it was interesting. We learnt to cook some dishes and taste so good. The host, she was lovely and patient. Now I know how to cook some Vietnamese food for my friends and my family. I will book their other activities when I come back to Vietnam next trip.
Rank_of_province: Số 16 trên 35 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Huế

Title: Lavyla Travel Company Limited
Description:
Our guide Anne was outstanding. She made our visit to HCMC extras special. Her knowledge of Vitamins history amazing. She was extremely professional, friendly and kind.
We highly recommend her to lead tours in Vietnam.

Title: Emily Private Tour
Description:
We booked a private tour through C-Vietnam Travel and Emily was our tour guide in Da Nang and Hoi An. She was punctual and very professional. She answered all of our questions thoroughly and gave us excellent insight into the Vietnamese culture and history. She gave us plenty of time to peruse the scenery and main attractions of each item on our itinerary, at our leisure.

We would highly recommend her.

Title: STAR KITCHEN
Address: 2F, 8/15 le Thanh Ton, Dist. 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 12345 Việt Nam
Description:
I had sakura cheese cake and matcha milk tea here. Sakura cheese cake has some kind of a jelly on top and the middle part is filled with cheese. I accidently bumped into this cafe walking through the beautiful japanese street and the interior was also devine. Very friendly staffs, beautiful interior, yummy cakes and milk tea. Highly recommend for people looking for a decent cake in HCMC.

Title: Daily Vietnam Tours
Description:
We booked with a local travel agent in Hanoi and our tour guide from "Vietnam Daily Tours' was Mr T , they picked us up at the arranged time which in our travel experience was a first so started off well and only got better throughout the day albeit very long which we knew from the start,(to do Halong bay from Hanoi and back is a LONG DAY) Mr T was a wonderful guide very Knowledgeable and quite different from other Vietnamese guides who can be very brash and annoying, He was gracious and very pleasant but able to guide all 25 or so on the bus with what felt like a personal touch from pick up time until drop off some 13 hours later.
Had a great day at the bay, wonderful weather which always make it good..
Totally recommend these Guys and if you can get Mr T your tour will be the better for it.

Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 3 Vui chơi & Giải trí ở Ninh Bình

Title: Travel Hub Vietnam
Description:
From our first contact by email, the representatives of this company made our visit to Vietnam super easy.
They met us at the airport and we were through the Visa process in minutes, leaving behind all those in our plane who were waiting for their stamp.
We planned a boat trip through Halong Bay for my husbands birthday and it was perfect- they even arranged for a cake! We did a cave tour and overnight stay in CatBa island. We met back up in Hanoi and They became our friends throughout our stay in north and south Vietnam, popping in and out for airplane transfers, car rides, hotel reservations and food tours. I honestly don’t think our trip would have been as enjoyable without them.
They customized each part of our trip according to our needs and budget and we never felt like we were really in a “tour”
Highly recommend them!
Rank_of_province: Số 263 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Vietnamese cooking class with Trang
Description:
a warm-hearted welcome, a room with feel - good atmosphere, many interesting talks with the hosts, getting inside - informations about Vietnam and exclusive excursions - all this made our 6 days in paradise something special.
But i am especially grateful for eternity with my holiday souvenir: Trang teached me to cook vietnamese dishes! So i can revive the vietnam feeling at any time! I continue to learn from her for a year after our stay: via what‘s app, instagram and recently via you tube!
But the best thing about our stay by Trang is that i found a new girlfriend -
a friendship across all borders!
Sooo many thanks dear Trang 💖
Rank_of_province: Số 6 trên 14 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Đảo Phú Quốc

Quan trọng là bỏ tiền ra uống mà không đc happy mà còn có cảm giác bị lừa. Lần đầu tiên cũng là lần cuối

Title: vietvacationtours
Description: Vietnam and Cambodia from Australia. From the planning stage to the end of the trip, I had the most fabulous time. My guides were always prompt and very helpful, the destinations were wonderful, and the accommodation was perfect. My trip involved a significant amount of travelling throughout both countries, yet I never felt rushed or overly tired. I worked with Lily in planning the trip and her suggestions and recommendations were all outstanding. This was my first time in Cambodia and Vietnam and I would love to return. I highly recommend Vietvacationtours to anyone planning a trip to Southeast Asia.

I WILL BE BACK for this tour!!!! Thanks again My Linh!!!

Title: YEN BAI ECO TOUR
Description: We are a group of international students from different countries in Vic Uni of Wellington, New Zealand. This is our trip in Vietnam but so far it is one of the best trip we’ve ever had. We’ve heard that Vietnam is such a beautiful country but we were still amazed by the beauty of the nature in Yenbai. I love the food of the ethnic people in here, the taste is very different, but in a super good way. I wish I can stuff heaps of those dishes into takeaway boxes and bring back to NZ. I was very impressed. The trek and the bicycle tour was nice. The homestay was nice as well, friendly staff, very helpful and the house was clean. I love it. People in Vietnam are generally very friendly, I think. Oh, swimming in the waterfall is a MUST. Overall, we are very happy with everything in this trip.

Title: Victory Cruises
Description: Had a fabulous 2 night/3day cruise on Halong Bay as part of a Mercury Vietnam Odyssey trip. Loved our cabin which was spacious enough for the trip. Very clean & most areas seemed to be well maintained. We had no issues. Middle deck had dining room and upper deck was for chilling. Sunbathing on the deck & nice drinks up there in the evening. Drinks were a wee bit pricey we thought. Food was amazing & beautifully presented & service professional. Lots of fish/seafood, but non fish people were well catered for too. Scenery was spectacular and the trips out in the tender were enjoyable. There was even night fishing. This cruise was one of the highlights of the whole trip. Thoroughly recommend.

Title: GERBERA SPA - THAI THERAPY
Address: 28 Vu Tong Phan, An Phu, D2, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 700000 Việt Nam
Description:
他のマッサージにはもういけない、、と思うほど連日通っていました！マッサージ技術も完璧、潔癖症の私でも全然問題ない清潔感、トイレの掃除も行き届いている、スタッフの方々もみーーーんな優しく接客してくれます。電話すれば無料でホテルまで迎えにきてくれるし、帰りは当たり前のように無料でホテルまで送り届けてくれます。
＊技術
技術に関してもう一度言いますが、レベル高いなと感じました。凝ってるなぁ、疲れてるなぁと思うところを集中的にやってくれて技術力がとても高いなと思います。
＊値段
値段は安過ぎない？と思うほど他店と変わらなです。私たちは1時間で肩と頭と背中と足のマッサージをしましたが、このメニューで1人400バーツ。ただ一点、難点？と言えば(街全体だけど)クレジットが使えないのでちゃんとお金を持っていかなければなりません。(日本円持っていればスタッフの人がチェンジしに行ってもくれるみたい)
＊補足
マッサージ以外にもペディキュアやマネキュアもあるようで、今回はできなかったけど次回やってみたいなって思います！(他のメニューも期待できる感じで全体的に安心感あるクオリティの高さ)
Rank_of_province: Số 69 trên 158 Vui chơi & Giải trí ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Waterland Restaurant Cooking Class
Description: A little weary of looking at the sights, we asked our hotel at short notice if they could recommend a cooking class that day. They recommended Waterland Restaurant cooking class, which was conveniently a short stroll down the road. As we could only do it in the afternoon, we weren't able to visit the markets (they'd closed for the day), but even without the market trip, the whole family (including teenage daughters) LOVED the class. Our host Ngoc had excellent English and was very thoughtful and informative in his explanations, while the young chef demonstrated the techniques involved with each dish. We made rice pancakes, spring rolls (fresh and fried), followed by beef noodle soup Hue-style (all absolutely delicious). After we made each dish, we sat down and ate it, then we would turn our attention to the next dish - so it was like a long extended lunch! (All in all, it took 2 and a half hours).There was no sense of being hurried or not knowing what we were doing (as I have read of other cooking class reviews) - instead we learned a lot about Vietnamese cooking, and feel confident we could recreate the dishes at home. It was also just a lot of fun to spend time with some lovely young Vietnamese people. Did I mention that the food was delicious?
Rank_of_province: Số 21 trên 35 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Huế

Title: Ho Chi Minh Scooter Tour
Description:
This was the ONLY and BAD experience we had in Vietnam (we stayed there for 3 weeks, so we had plenty of time to visit and enjoy the country). Anyone show up, no one was picking up the phone, no one called us or contacted us. We paid $30 to live this experience and did not happen. The phone number was disconnected and messenger platform was unattended. Believe me I’m not the kind of person who love writing a review, but this case definitely deserve it.
Don’t waste your time and your money, if you go to Ho Chi Minh choose another tour operator.

Enjoy Vietnam, is spectacular ✌🏼☺️

Title: Pacific Boat Phu Quoc
Description:
Unfortunately my snorkelling trip with Pacific Boat was unable to go ahead because of bad weather. I wanted to review this company, however, because if the trip had been even half as good as the communication, it would have been amazing!

From the time I first enquired, Henry’s communication was outstanding, prompt, clear and respectful. The weather wasn’t great during my three days on Phu Quoc but Henry stayed in touch and was ready to proceed with the trip right up until the last minute

Pacific Boat are clearly a company that put safety and customer experience over profit.

Thank you, Henry, for your kindness and honesty and for the great restaurant recommendation!

Better luck next time I visit! Lisa from NZ 😊

Title: Pineapple Cooking Centre
Address: 35 Hang Buom, Hà Nội 10000 Việt Nam
Description:
We had a great time with Pineapple restaurant and the cooking class. They catered to my wife's eating (she doesn't eat meat but does eat seafood) and had 4 fantastic dishes ready for us.
Fried bean curd in tomato sauce
Vegetarian freid spring rolls

Title: Shanla Bar
Address: 150/9 Nguyễn Trãi, Phường Bến Thành, Quận 1 Tầng 2, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 70000 Việt Nam
Description:
Walking past, and noticed this place. Entrance was small and up some lifts, and was very surprised to enter a proper club with lights and full bar......Reminded me of the MZ club not too far away, exact same set up and decor.
Like the MZ club has expensive drinks and lots of girls.

I came as the door man said they had good live music......unfortunately that wasn't quite true. The band walked on stage looking like they were about to rock the place........ instead they started with Linger by the Cranberries, then another low key song this time Radiohead (as if i wasn't depressed enough with the prices of the drinks), and then played ColdPlay........I mean JHC, WTF. Three strikes and I'm out of here....... what a bizarre set.......

Title: The Warehouse
Address: 46 Ngô Quyền Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội 100000 Việt Nam
Description: I have spent thousands of dollars at this shop as it was in my neighborhood and convenient. I recently made a significant purchase that included a couple of cheap bottles of wine in the purchase. When I got home later, I noticed that one of the caps on one of the cheap bottles of wine was spinning and slid right off (not sealed properly). When I noticed it, I put it aside, assuming I could just get it replaced later on my next visit because it was a cheap bottle of wine, I hadn’t drank any of it, it was clearly not drinkable, and I had been a loyal customer. When I eventually went back to return the bottle, and simply asked to exchange it for one that was normal or credit my account, I was told No, it’s been too long since I bought it. Aside from losing a customer who has spent thousands of dollars over a 10 dollar bottle of wine, I would think that there would be a better sense of customer service than that. I have since found a better place to get higher quality wine for cheaper prices actually, so it’s not a big deal from a wine perspective, but it is quite disappointing, and I am obviously done shopping there!
Rank_of_province: Số 134 trên 207 Giải trí về đêm ở Hà Nội

Description:
A great afternoon cooking class at Tam Croc Lantern restaurant.

The team were very catering to our vegetarian request and we were able to choose/modify three classic Vietnamese dishes to prepare and cook, together with a chef and the restaurant manager.

The dishes were really tasty - some of the best food we've had in Vietnam - and the team were extremely knowledgeable and friendly. Would highly recommend.
